Summary Heading: Nice room with a great price
Summary: Nice. We had a few minor few problems but two employes, Christy and Patty, stepped way up to take care of us, we couldn't had nicer and better people helping us than them. The only negative about is "The Bistro" prices are way to high but you can walk a block either way from the hotel and there was great places to eat.
Manager Response: LKYMIKE, thank you for the great review.  We always appreciate it when our guests share their thoughts.  It sounds like overall it was a great stay.  I am happy to hear that Patty and Christy took great care of you.  We are lucky to have them.  As for the Bistro, I know that are pricing is quite competitive with those similar hotels in our area.  We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: I've been to several Courtyards in the past but this one has surpassed my expectations! Everyone was super friendly! The front desk manager Patti went out her way to make sure my family and I was comfortable after a long flight. Kristina followed her lead in ensuring our stay was beyond anything we expected! The staff is amazing! I will surely return!
Manager Response: 1kaleighr, thank you very much for your comments.  I am so happy that Patty and the entire team took great care of you.  I will share your comments with everyone.  Please come back soon.

Summary Heading: Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana Amazing hotel and staff!
Summary: Let's start off by saying Patti and Kristina are the best! They went above and beyond for my daughter and I while we stayed at the hotel. I flew cross country to a town that I wasn't familiar with and they made me feel at home. Friendly is an understatement! Every concern was met and I had zero complaints throughout my stay. The bar staff was delightful and made me feel welcomed even throughout a busy wedding weekend for the hotel. I must say, Marriot did an amazing job with their hires❤️  See you soon Courtyard Santa Ana!
Manager Response: 385triciar, thank you for your review and your recognition of both Christina and Patty.  I am glad that they made you feel welcome.  We are lucky to have them both.  Also, we appreciate you mentioning the Bistro team as well.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: This is a nice hotel located in a corporate area. I called the hotel the day before and received exactly the location I requested. The room was clean, comfortable with nice decor. The staff was friendly and helpful. I did have a problem with parking ( it's limited ) but the staff took care of it and refunded the $20 parking fee. I would definitely return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Paul W, thanks for your great review.  I am glad to hear that the team took good care of you.  We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. Very friendly and helpful staff, especially Vanessa. Eagerly looking forward to my next stay. Thanks for the wonderful experience.  Jonathan you have mentored a great team......
Manager Response: binoyad, thank you very much for your comments and mentioning both team members Vanessa and Jonathan.  I am glad that they both provided excellent customer service.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel lies to customers and not being helpful!! One of my friend forgot her carry on bag right outside the lobby entrance of the hotel. We called and asked if the general manager can check the camera to find who took it to file a missing report, they lied that they dont have security camera there. We did not trust them. So when another friend of mine came back, he pointed out MANY cameras. This hotel continued to lie that the cameras weren’t working! This service is so unacceptable! Imagine if there was an accident happened right in front of this hotel lobby, they won’t have the security cameras to protect your rights!
Manager Response: It is unfortunate that you left you luggage unattended for several hours.  While we do have cameras inside the hotel there are none what so ever outside. Again we do recommend that you follow up with a police report.

Summary Heading: Worst Customer Service!!!! Think about your safety first
Summary: Be careful to decide to book this hotel. I lost my bags at the entrance. I understand that was my fault and try to reach out the hotel for support to identify the suspect to file the police report and they tried to get away from this by many unreasonable reasons. First they said there is no camera until my friends come there to point out that many cameras out there. Then after that they said that all of those cameras are not working. OMG!!! I cannot believe that. If somethings terrible happens, you definitely got no help from them. Just be careful and think about yourself first to book this horrible hotel. Nobody is going to help you out if you accidentally have trouble. They will lie to you and try to get out of the situation. No security camera working means they don’t care
Manager Response: ngang138,  it is unfortunate that you left you luggage unattended outside of the hotel.  We have no reason not to be helpful however we do not have cameras outside the hotel.  We never had them ever outside the building.  We have several inside the building working just fine.  We do hope that filing a police report as we suggested helps you with this matter.

Summary: We were helped out by Shanice, immensely.  We had been traveling cross country and were exhausted. Shanice was super friendly and accommodating going the extra mile to get us checked in and comfortable in a great room.  I can’t say enough complimentary about her service!
Manager Response: 752oneee, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are thrilled to read about your interactions with Shanice.  We are very lucky to have her on the team.  Traveling such a far distance can be exhausting.  So glad she gave you the warm welcome.  Please come back the next time you are in Orange County.

Summary Heading: Excellent staff, Venessa, especially ,Went out of her way to help with my internet connection.
Summary: Also overall  a very nice hotel to stay, as it is so close to some of California best shopping  at  South Coast plaza shopping . Have been travelling there  for about 10 years now ,and will always stay there. Live in Australia travel there as i am a classic car collector and restorer.
Manager Response: J4390ORwayner, thank you so much for mentioning Vanessa and how she helped you out.  We are glad to have her on the team.  You are correct to mention that we have a great location when it comes to one of Southern California's most high end mall.  We look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: The property was nice upon entry. Our room had minor A/C unit problems. The front desk agent kiara was very pleasant in assisting with switching rooms.The hot tub is closed unfortuantely but the pool was open still, not receieving housekeeping service was a bummer. but the gentleman johnathan at the front desk let us know due to covid we wouldnt be serviced everyday. I would visit this property again.
Manager Response: laurenmA8778DA, Thank you very much for the five star review.  It is great to see that overall you had a great stay.  I will definitely look into the the issue with your AC. Glad that matter could be resolved quickly.  Please also know that if requested, you can most certainly have housekeeping service.  We are here to make sure you have a clean and comfortable stay.  Come back soon.

Summary Heading: I would look for a hotel that cleans the room every day
Summary: For the price they charge they should clean the room. They claim they don’t clean dew to Covid. That is a poor excuse. The acoustics are bad and you can hear what ever is going on on upper floor or outside the door. The bathroom is fine and the soaps smell great. The bed is comfortable.
Manager Response: Talyn2014, thanks for your feedback.  Our housekeeping protocol is for the health and safety of guests and our employees.  We will service your room upon request and bring you anything you need.  I am glad to read you found the room comfortable.  We thank you for your business.

Summary: It was so conveniently located from John Wayne Airpot.  I use to work a few blocks away and our company use to always house our employees here.  The check in was professional and friendly.  The gentleman checking me in was extremely friendly and courteous.  He gave me an upgrade to a king suite and the room was clean, the bed was comfortable and I could have not asked for anything more.
Manager Response: GregC1, thank you taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay.  We have the perfect location for both business and pleasure.  I am particularly glad to hear that you found us both clean and friendly.  Exceeding expectations in both areas is important to us.  Please come back soon.

Summary: Casey at front desk was exceptional. With all we are going through with Covid, it hasn’t been easy for business travel and the workers who deal with travelers. But Casey was great! With mask on, you could see her smile and her attempt at making my stay as pleasant as could be.
Manager Response: laseguin, thank you very much for your comments. We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your interactions with Kasey at the front desk.  We are lucky to have her.  We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: WE stayed here overnight the last weekend of August and just some observations, the first room we checked in had a very noisy air conditioner, but they moved us to another room anyway, there is still no housekeeping so you can only request for towels for the next day, unfortunately, if you request for towels, they just leave the towels outside your door, on the floor, what happened to knocking, parking can be a challenge though it was free, we did not see any parking charge on our bill, the hotel is near costa mesa mall, mitsuwa market and bristol st with a lot of restaurants, around five mins by car, the bathroom is clean, hot water is hot, the front desk personnel - well so so , Keith was friendly, but the others could use lessons in smile 101, although an african american
Manager Response: Benison C, thank you for your comments.  I am glad that we were able to accommodate you with a room move that met your expectations.  We do work hard to make sure that all of our guests have a clean and comfortable stay.  While we are not doing stayover cleaning for the health and safety of both guest and our associates, we certainly do have better protocol when it comes to handling guest room deliveries.  We do hope you will come back and join us again

Summary: Excellent place to stay. Great location, clean place. David and Liz were amazing and truly gave us a better staycation then planned. I felt welcomed and greeted as a top of the line hotel should!  Place is OC quality, highly recommend. I stay e Er where and of my favorite
Manager Response: dustina625, I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for your review and your comments regarding Liz and David. it is good to hear that these valuable team members made such a great impression.  We hope that you will come back soon.  Stay safe and healthy during these times.

Summary Heading: Keels the night audit is the BEST!!!!!
Summary: Keela is the absolute best she made sure my cousins and I were well coming in at 2:30am and she had the greatest loving attitude that bit many people would have at 2:30am...THE BEST...10/10 recommend!!
Manager Response: Tripster90242,  Thank you very much for recognizing Keela at the front desk.  I am so glad that she made a great first impression during your early arrival.  It is good to hear that you enjoyed your visit with us.  Please come back soon.

Summary Heading: Getting better with newly renovated rooms
Summary: The new room renovations make a big difference. While the renovations are not a full gut they did replace the aged wallpaper, carpets and soft furniture. Much better compared to before.   As before, the staff is attentive and helpful.
Manager Response: TTravel70,  Thank you for your review.  I am glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.  It is also good to hear that you enjoy your interactions with the team members here in Santa Ana.  Please come back soon.

Summary: my daughter did not feel when we arrived; however, the staff, specifically Liz, Jorge and Carlos were wonderful in making sure that my daughter had everything she needed to feel better and that we were comfortable.  can't recommend the staff of this hotel enough.
Manager Response: Nick K, Thanks so much for taking the time to leave a review.  I have shared your comments with the entire team here in Santa Ana.  We are very lucky to have Liz, Jorge, and Carlos on the team.  We hope your daughter is feeling better.  Please come back soon.

Summary: I am typically a Hilton guy butvwas out here for a RE event and stayed where the event was at.  I was very impressed.  Andrew and Vanessa at the front desk were especially nice.  Really made me feel good.  I am really sick of traveling and being away from my family.  I was regretting this trip but the staff at this hotel made it better.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Dave P,   I am so glad to see that a Hilton fan took the time to leave a five star review.  Thank you so much for your feedback.  I truly appreciate it.  We are especially lucky to have Andrew and Vanessa on the team here in Santa Ana.  Please come back soon.  We will be glad to enroll you in Marriott Bon Voy.

Summary: This was another last-minute booking - the need to get away overcame our desire to seriously cut back on these costly weekend getaways.  When we arrived, the driveway in front of the hotel was packed with cars, and the guy working valet was trying to ensure everyone knew where they were going, and what to do to self-park. It's a good thing he shared parking information so freely, because the girl at registration did not. She was clearly new - and in the middle of training. I hope her manager took note of the information she didn't share, and the things we had to ask about a few times before getting a correct answer (from the manager, by the way. The trainee probably shouldn't have been on the front desk at that stage in her career.)  On our first night there, the parking lot was
Manager Response: Simey Travels,  Thanks for your taking the time for your detailed review.  I am glad that overall you enjoyed your stay including our spacious rooms.  We always have plenty of parking available and friendly attendants to guide you to our garage when outdoor parking is full.  We will also assist with luggage as well.  As for the front desk representative, I remember my first time "Jitters" on the desk many many years ago.  I appreciate your patience as we set our new employees up for success.    We look forward to your return trip.

Summary: I thought the hotel was a great value and price.  It had great help from the Liz when I arrived at the hotel showing me amenities of the hotel and places to eat around Santa Ana .   The rooms were spacious and relaxing.   The location of the hotel is right off the 55 and minutes away from John Wayne airport and close by Costa Mesa, Santa Ana and Irvine if you are visiting those cities the hotel would be a great place to stay.   I would recommend using the valet parking since it only a few dollars more than self parking and the valet agents were helpful and insightful.
Manager Response: t0kra,  Thank you for your review.  I am glad that you enjoyed our great Orange County location as well as our spacious rooms.  We are perfect for business or leisure travel.  It is great to hear that you enjoyed your interactions with Liz at the front desk.  She is very helpful.  Please come back soon.

Summary: As an Ambassador Elite with Marriott I stay at a lot of Marriott hotels.  And as someone who is spends a lot of nights in hotels it is the little things that make life easier.   This is a standard Courtyard.  Clean room, updated bathroom, larger than normal gym.    What this hotel did was recognized me as a Bonvoy Elite member when I checked in and had a gift basket in my room.    As a result I will focus on staying at this hotel when I come to OC, which is often.   Some other positives - 1.3 miles from SNA; Easy access to the 55 and other freeways and food choices within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thanks for your 5-star review. I do appreciate the time taken, especially by one of our Marriott Bon Voy elites. Thank you so much for being loyal to the brand. It is good to hear that we are conveniently located to your business needs in Orange County and that you enjoy many of our amenities. If you are ever here on a Monday evening please join me at my Manager's reception from 5:30-6:30pm. Looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Good location but rooms starting to show their age
Summary: I have stayed here for multiple business trips. The location is great and the courtyard facing rooms are quiet. The lobby and bistro areas are nicely appointed. Unfortunately the rooms are dated and show their age. My last room had stains on the carpet and just looked tired. With a room remodel this hotel would be a five star!
Manager Response: TTravel70, Thanks for your review.  I appreciate the feedback.  I am glad that you enjoy the courtyard view rooms and our public spaces.  You mentioned that you have been here multiple times.  Have we met at my weekly manager's reception on Mondays from 5:30-6:30? I will definitely follow up on your carpet comments.  As many other reviews state we take our cleanliness very seriously.  I do hope that you return soon.  I look forward to meeting you soon.

Summary: Let me first say that this hotel was more than I expected..i checked in Sunday morning and immediately I was greeted by a very sweet young lady named andrea, she was informative and made checking in very easy.   She had then told me about breakfast and coffee at there bistro,which I had to check out! I was then  Happily welcomed by the two girls waiting to help me out. I didnt get there names but they both wore glasses! I ordered a breakfast burrito and a venti caramel latte. Breakfast was hot and delicious and coffee was perfect! The two girls were knowledgeable of menu items and seemed attentive and organized. I was very pleased!   I had left to see family most of my day, but I stopped by the bistro for a drink before bed. Again staff was very friendly. Going up to my room was
Manager Response: Travingtheoc,  I cannot thank you enough for such a wonderful review.  I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay and that the team members here in Santa Ana including those you mentioned by name, Endrea and Audrey made such a difference.  You have many choices when it comes to hotels here in Santa Ana and I am glad that you chose ours and that you will be back soon.  We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel to Host Corporate Meetings
Summary: We hosted our regional meeting over the course of 4-days and the hotel and staff not only met our expectations, but greatly exceeded them! The meeting space and rooms were very clean, modern and functional.  Staff have was very pleasant, helpful and knowledgeable.  Our events coordinator Leslie H. was very organized and assisted with all aspects of planning.  The farm-fresh style menus ensured our team were eating quality food and their dietary restrictions were met. We enjoyed our stay so much that we will be planning our future meeting at this property.  Thank you Courtyard!
Manager Response: SWFritolay,  It was a joy to have you all here for the entire week.  We are lucky to have Leslie on our team.  I am glad that she took great care of you and that you also enjoyed the many team members that you encountered as well as our fantastic food.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: I recently had a change to my work schedule and had to make a change to my reservation. I spoke with Liz over the phone  several times. She was extremely professional and helpful. Thank you to Liz and Rose for their help. Much appreciated!
Manager Response: Maszak, I am so glad that we took care of you when your travel plans changed.  We are quite lucky here to have Liz and Rose at the front desk taking care of our guests.  I will share your comments with them.  Travel schedules can be stressful and they sure came through!  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Thanks for taking the time to recognize two great associates here in Santa Ana.

Summary: I have been regularly staying at this Courtyard for the past 10 months. The property and rooms are consistently above average Marriott standards, and most importantly is the friendliness and professionalism of the entire staff - housekeeping, restaurant/bistro, parking attendants and especially the front desk.  Deserving special recognition are the front desk managers, Rose Mauricio and Liz Widner.  Rose and Liz have consistently exceeded my expectations in assuring my stays are excellent experiences, always going above and beyond in meeting my requests.
Manager Response: PHILK769, Thank you very much for your review.  It is so great to hear from one of our regular, loyal guests.  I am thrilled that you have enjoyed your encounters with all of our great team members especially Rose and Liz at the front desk.  We are lucky to have them.  We look forward to seeing you soon.  Thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: Breath of fresh air from a great staff
Summary: The hotel was nice and the room was comfy. I loved the homey decor; it's hard to find nowadays. Casey was incredible at check-in. He was friendly and he was able to assist us with amazing recommendations for dinner. He is a true asset to the Marriott company and to your property. Audrey was a ray of sunshine in the morning and it was great interacting with her. I really enjoyed the food from the Bistro both in the AM and the PM. Franco assisted me with my chardonnay and he was very friendly. Kudos to the AM Bistro cook too. I ordered the "eggs your way" and it was spectacular.  On the other hand, the general manager, Robert Kravitz, was not so great. He was grumpy, impolite and seemed insincere. My interactions with him were nothing but unpleasant.   Overall my stay was great.
Manager Response: CaliforniaDreamer92, Thank you for your kind words about most of the team members here in Santa Ana.  I am glad that you enjoyed your many interactions with Casey, Audrey, and Franco.  I will definitely share your thoughts.  As for me, I am sorry if I ever came off as you described.  I am always available for feedback and welcome it at any time. As a matter of fact I hope all of my guests attend the manager’s reception I host every Monday from 5:30-6:30pm.  I always enjoy chatting with all of my guests getting to know them.   Again, thanks for taking the time to write an overall great review.  I look forward to speaking with you again soon.    Rob Kravitz  General Manager

Summary: There are several Marriott properties around the area - I like this one - near to SNA airport, near to the highway. Hotel is clean, comfortable and service is good.  The parking rates are a little high but goes with the area. Breakfast choices are good.
Manager Response: duttash,  The team here in Santa Ana appreciates your kind words about our hotel.  We strive to exceed expectations.  Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to your return.

Summary: We had the pleasure of having Endrea serve us at the Bistro for five days. She was polite, efficient and made our stay extra special. She either needs a raise or promotion at your hotel. What impressed me most was her patience even when it was busy. This is a quality one seldom finds these days, especially in young adults. Thank you Endrea!!  We also had a good experience with our valet Michael. Pleasant young man!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words about Endrea.  We are very lucky to have her as part of the team.  I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay and your experiences with one of our best associates in the Bistro.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon

Summary: Staff is not the most helpful of the Marriott chain. Still paying high prices to stay at this hotel. Outside people should be paying for parking and not the customers staying at the hotel. Room was decent this time. May stay at springhill suites down the street next time.
Manager Response: Dear tlcroses,  Thank you for your feedback.  We're disappointed that you did not feel that our staff was helpful during your stay.  We take service quality very seriously, and appreciate your comments and will discuss your perception with our team in order to learn and improve. We hope that we will earn your business in the future.  Please note, most hotels in this area do charge for parking, so be sure to carefully check the hotel website or call ahead to verify.

Summary Heading: best customer service employee in the Marriott staff ranks
Summary: the hotel was cookie cutter just like all the recent courtyards. nothing really good out except for the front desk employee Vanessa. after a long day of travel to the hotel I pulled in at 5pm. she greeted me with a smile and answer to all my questions. she anticipated what I needed and as a titanium elite member on Bonvoy what is was entitled to which is a little extra TLC.  I wish  could say that about other properties where I end up arguing over what exactly free breakfast is and why no upgrades are offered. She on the other hand was terrific.  I had a few things I was juggling and she ran and got be a shopping bag.  I needed change for the laundry machine and she gave free laundry soap.  She took care of my parking and was so pleasant.  It is amazing how its the little
Manager Response: Dear NomiS167, Thank you for taking the time to leave such a kind and detailed review.  We're so proud of Vanessa and that rest of our team, and it's always nice to share these comments with them. We appreciate your business and Marriott loyalty and hope that we'll have the opportunity to welcome you back the next time you're in Orange County.

Summary: I stayed for 1 night before catching my flight the next morning. I was in the hotel for a very short while. I checked in around 11 PM at night and I was out of there by 10 AM in the morning. Had a good nights sleep. Breakfast at the bistro was healthy and fresh, Service was prompt. Good location. Very easy access to John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Dear ShankerB, We appreciate your business and thank you for taking the time to leave a detailed review of your stay. We're thrilled that the convenient airport location met your needs, and that you had a chance to enjoy our healthy choices from the Bistro.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in Orange County.

Summary: Really nice room with couch. Comfortable and clean, standard Courtyard Marriott.  Staff was friendly enough. Self-parking was $14.  I do love the sayings on the keycards that make it casual and fun. That stood out, as it does at every Courtyard.  Would go back.
Manager Response: Dear SpontaneousKL,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments about your recent stay.  We're so glad that you enjoyed the hotel and the "casual and fun" atmosphere that we strive to provide.  We would love to welcome you back on a future visit to Santa Ana.

Summary Heading: Exceptional Customer Service, Very Friendly - Vanessa
Summary: Thank you, Vanessa, for making my stay, brief as it was, perfectly smooth, pleasant and charming. It was just-another-Courtyard, but you made the stay exceptional with your quick, attentive and smart solutions. Thank you and Merci, Vanessa and the Courtyard night staff. Hope to be back right away.
Manager Response: Dear Bigsmiles818,  Your comment brought a big smile to our face.  We're always delighted to hear from our satisfied guests and we love hearing that our team members made an impression on you and enhanced your stay experience.  It will be our pleasure to share your kind words with Vanessa and the rest of the team.  We hope to welcome you back here soon.

Summary: I have stayed at this location multiple times. It is ok but nothing great. The rooms feel tired and they need better sound proofing. You can hear the busy road (ask for the courtyard side) and the neighbors. The room layout is small and dated.  They also charge for parking.   The bistro has a decent selection of food.   Platinum upgrades are rare unless asked for.   Overall average. I only stay at this location due to convenience and company rate.
Manager Response: Dear Tim70s,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  We're disappointed to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and will share your comments with the rest of our team.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the delicious Bistro options and hope that we'll have the opportunity to welcome you back on future visits.

Summary Heading: good hotel for the business traveler.
Summary: I just stayed here for 1 night after my work trip through So-Cal. I was flying out of Santa Ana so this was a great choice. Check in was a breeze. i was on the 2nd floor. the elevators on one side were broken but it was no big deal. room was well furnished. Internet speed was decent to slow (thats something to be improved) - the pantry and the bistro cafe are great places to get something quick to eat / drink during breakfast and dinner. Highly recommended when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear ShankerB, Thank you for the wonderful review. We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay and that our hotel met your needs at the end of a busy work week. We do apologize for the elevator maintenance, and are happy to report that both elevators are back in business!  We hope you have a wonderful holiday season and that we'll have the chance to welcome you back in 2019.

Summary: I would not normally complain since we got an excellent rate through a family member but our stay here was not great. The bed was EXTREMELY uncomfortable, the bathroom was not as clean as it should have been and we could hear our neighbors and people in the hallway on a constant basis. During check-in I asked for the exact amount being charged to my card. I was given an amount then checked my bank to find 2 separate amounts had been charged to my account almost twice the amount as I was told. I do not know why they feel the need to charge paying guests a nightly parking fee either. The location is good and they have Netflix.
Manager Response: Dear tcoston82, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We're sorry to hear that the recent stay was not up to our typical Courtyard standards. We pride ourselves on offering comfort and impeccable cleanliness, and we're sorry to have fallen short during your visit. We do hope that you took a moment to speak with a staff member during your stay, so that we had a chance to right the situation. Your comments are important to us, and we will share your words with the rest of the team.

Summary: Nice hotel very clean very friendly staff. The only issue is the parking they charge 14 dlls a day for parking and coming back at night we did not find parking people for other places parked at hotels parking
Manager Response: Dear Chfranco, Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to leave your feedback.  We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay and that our friendly staff was able to accommodate your needs.  We apologize for the parking difficulties and hope that someone from our helpful parking team was able to assist.  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Courtyard Santa Ana Orange County Stay
Summary: The staff was very welcoming and were accommodating with our late check in.  The room was spacious and clean.  Checking in and checking out was easy.  The front desk was very responsive to our request for items for the room.  The only negatives...the room doors do not close quietly and we were awakened both mornings of our stay by our neighbor's leaving her room and the door slamming upon her departure.  The only other issue was a leaking shower head that had a small drip.  Nothing that kept us up, but was more of an issue for me from an environmental/water conservation standpoint.
Manager Response: Dear Erik S, Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We appreciate your business and the time that you took to leave us your comments.  We're so glad that you enjoyed your overall stay, and we're grateful for the feedback.  AS we also take water conservation very serious, we appreciate the heads up and will have our team make the immediate repairs.  Have a wonderful holiday season and we will look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Over all I had a good experience at this location. I would have loved to have some more food options from the hotel but the staff made up for this miss. Rose and James made our nights coming in from a long day at work more enjoyable with a smile and a greeting each night.
Manager Response: Dear Chris T, It's always a pleasure to receive comments about our amazing team members.  We're so proud to know that their great service helped to make a long trip a little more comfortable for you and your fellow travelers.  We know that it can be difficult to be on the road for an extended time, and it was our pleasure to make you a part of the family during your stay at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  Should you need to visit again, we'll be here to welcome you back.

Summary: I’m not sure how old the hotel is, from the outside it doesn’t appear to be an older property, but inside is definitely getting tired. The room color scheme is still that yellow/gold/reddish color.  My carpets were stained, there was a hole in the black out curtain, the wooden furniture was seriously chipped/nicked and the small couch looked like a water buffalo slept on it for the last couple years.   The lobby and gym looked like they’d probably been updated within the last few years, but none of the finish outs were similar to new properties.   Given there are about 5 hotels in the immediate area,  and even another Marriott, I’ll try those next time I’m out.
Manager Response: Dear DallasJeffA,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.  We're disappointed that we failed to wow you with during your most recent stay at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We take cleanliness very seriously,  and will share your comments with our team.  We sincerely appreciate the comments, and look forward to earning your business in the future.

Summary: I wanted to give a higher rating as the staff are very attentive and nice. My room is on the first floor and I could heard the guest above waling back and forth for over an hour. The front desk was very nice and helpful but essentially there was nothing they could do. I would recommend staying on a higher floor to possibly avoid this.   The room is clean with a little wear but overall nice. I would say the best feature of the hotel is the staff.
Manager Response: Hello Robin G,  Thank you for your valuable feedback for our property. We are very glad that our staff made a positive impact on your experience at our hotel. I sincerely apologize that your room being on the ground floor was less than ideal. I understand how frustrating that can be. We hope that you decide to give us another chance to impress you with not only our staff - but our rooms as well. Please feel free to reach out to me, Casey Willits, the next time you are in the Orange County area and I will ensure that you are taken care of.  Have a lovely Sunday.

Summary: Good clean rooms. Friendly staff. Over flow parking late at night is minor inconvenience. Appreciate being recognized as Platinum Elite with f & b credit! Great Location off the 55 close to Chapman University.
Manager Response: Dear jutsugi, It was our pleasure to welcome you at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We appreciate your loyal Marriott business, and thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback for our team, and future guests.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice to have someone on staff finally agree with me...
Summary: I have stayed here over a dozen times since it opened.  It's convenient to our OC office across the street and I'm grateful for the Reward Points.  It's not the Ritz so it doesn't qualify for 5 stars.  The staff is always professional and courteous. The rooms are clean and comfortable.    Here the 2 things that bug me about the hotel: 1 the electrical outlets are so loose that charging even a cell phone beside the bed is nearly impossible.  Also, there are no USB ports in the room. 2 (this is where someone on staff has finally agreed with me) Other than the 4th floor AT&T cell reception is nearly nonexistent.  At check-in, this past week, one of the staff acknowledged the weak AT&T signal.  PLEASE DO SOMETHING TO IMPROVE/BOOST THE SIGNAL!  Why I'm I writing this review after all
Manager Response: Dear David D,  Thank you for being a repeat guest, and for taking the time to share your comments.  We sincerely appreciate the feedback and will share with our team in an effort to make noticeable improvements to the two issues that you mentioned. It is always a gift for us to receive this honest feedback so that we can better meet the needs of our guests.  Thank you for your time.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Nice hotel but there was a very serious harassment problem, which was brought up to staff on site that night and again the next morning and no action was taken. Have called to follow-up multiple times. I will not be staying here again and will advise all of my friends and family to do the same.
Manager Response: Dear SierraDenver,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at our hotel.  Your comments are concerning, as we take any report of harassment very seriously.  Please contact me directly so I may look into this matter further.  Kind Regards,   Marjorie Culley

Summary: Customer service is so important especially when traveling after a long day.  This location has a great staff who always greet guests with a smile and a friendly hello.   They go out of their way to make sure you are satisfied while staying here.  The rooms are nice and clean.   Vanessa is amazing, professional, friendly...She goes out of her way to make sure your visit is the best.....Hard to find staff like Vanessa...she very customer oriented...
Manager Response: Dear lb2murrieta,  Thank you for your kind words.  As a Marriott, we strive to meet the standards of service that Marriott and Courtyards are known for.  It is always nice to share comments like yours with our team.  We agree, Vanessa is a rock star!  Thank you for staying at COurtyard Santa Ana, and please come visit soon.

Summary: I stayed at this Courtyard for business on Sept 12th, and I was treated very well.  Everyone was very friendly, my room was upgraded due to my Platinum Premiere status, and the service from everyone including the valet attendants, the front desk employees, and cafe servers was excellent!  I will not hesitate to stay at this Courtyards the next time I am in Orange County!
Manager Response: Dear Mark B, We are so proud to receive your kind review.  It is our goal to provide top service and a quality for all of our guests, but it is always nice to receive feedback like yours. It'll be my pleasure to share your words with the rest of the team, and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: It was our second time at this hotel. Very clean rooms, facilities. Excellent service from all the staff who attended to us. Special mention though were James of front desk and Anthony of valet. Heated pool and jacuzzi were perfect.  In other words, no complaints... Only thanks to everyone. Will definitely go back and recommend to every.
Manager Response: Dear Gigi N,  We're so proud to have earned your repeat business, and delighted to know that you enjoyed your visit.  We are always happy to hear when our team members make a positive impression on a guest, and we will be sharing your kind words with James, Anthony, and the rest of the team.  Thank you for your comments.  We hope to see you again, soon.

Summary: I have stayed there in the past, and I will keep coming back.  This Courtyard is ideally located close to easy access to the 55 and 405N.  The valet parking staff always greeted me, even though I was self parking.  The front desk staff was friendly and efficient, and they took the time to address my questions.  Getting an Elite member gift of a water bottle and chocolate bar was a plus, too.
Manager Response: Dear Robert K, Thank you for your wonderful comments.  We are so proud that our amazing team and hotel have earned your repeat business.  We're delighted that you have enjoyed your time at the Courytard Santa Ana, and we thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.  See you soon!

Summary: Rooms were kept clean and tidy, but the best part for my stay was the very accommodating staff members at this location.  Everyone at there from valet to the front desk were gracious and pleasant.  Josh at the valet was extremely helpful as I was on crutches during the time and Casey the operations manager was quick to respond to my requests.  All in all, one of the best hotels I've stayed at. 5/5 stars
Manager Response: Dear Jason S, Thank you for your wonderful comments.  It is always our pleasure to hear guests mention our helpful team members by name, and we are so proud to have earned your 5 star review.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on future visits to Orange County.

Summary: This property is mismanaged and does not meet the standards of The Marriott Brands. I am a Marriott lifetime Platinum member and I am very familiar with their standards.   Pros Newly built and updated Expanded food menu Did grant my late checkout Cons Never responded to pre arrival requests via app Did not accommodate my early check in request (waited 45 mins for room) Did not accommodate my preferred room selection Had to wait over 40 mins for pull out sheets and pillows even though I requested them earlier in the day Did not upgrade my room or apologize for not which most Marriotts do acknowledge.  Did not thank me for my Platinum status which is always the case whenever I check in Maid service failed to replenish towels one day Cleaned my room early when I requested late
Manager Response: Dear Anotnats, Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.  We have reviewed all of your comments and will be discussing with our team so that we can make improvements for future stays.  We sincerely apologize that your recent stay did not meet your expectations and that we fell short of your standards. This is very disappointing to us, and not reflective of the service standards that we try to uphold.  While there were aspects of your stay that were out of our team's control, we apologize for not better communicating with you when we were not able to meet your needs. Thank you for your time, and for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Good hotel but horrible cellphone reception!
Summary: The hotel overall is great. However, if you are traveling for work or leisure and hopes to use your cellphone inside the hotel, you will have to step out of the hotel to make phone calls or simply make them over wifi. I stayed in the first floor and had no reception whatsoever, which made it extremely difficult to get any work done.  besides that, the service is great overall and the hotel is a nice place to stay near the highway making easy to get around.
Manager Response: Dear brunodZ7357SD,  We're so sorry to hear that you had difficulties with your cellular service during your stay.  Various carriers have towers in the area, and we maintain relationships with them so that we can be informed if service is down or under maintenance.  We were not informed of any recent outages, but do understand the frustration of not being able to connect, and we sincerely apologize that you were inconvenienced during your stay.   We hope you enjoyed the rest of your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Had a nice stay for one night this last weekend. Everything was as expected except one thing - the bathroom door in the room was awkwardly positioned next to the main door into the room. The result is that the bathroom door must auto-close. Both cannot be open. Just a poorly designed layout.
Manager Response: Dear Paul G, Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're so glad that you enjoyed your one night stay, and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: I was initially impressed by the property and the service, and James seemed to be taking care of us.   When I received my bill for the 1st night (because I had two separate reservations, due to flight changes), I was charged for some items that I was led to believe (I'm a gold member) were meant to be complimentary.  I spoke to a different representative the next day who took the parking fee charge off to make up for the incidentals charges from the previous night.  I was happy with this solution.  Parking is an issue!!  We returned late from our event and were told to park in the parking garage. When we tried to exit the next morning, the machine told us the validation was expired (no one from the hotel told us we needed to exit by 8:00 a.m.)  Luckily, the parking company
Manager Response: Dear Kdave1967,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments.  We're extremely disappointed to hear about the issues during your stay, as this is not reflective of the typical experience or service that we pride ourselves on delivering. We will use your comments as an opportunity to work with each of our departments to improve and prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

Summary Heading: Courtyard - nuff said - Very Tight Parking Lot
Summary: It's a Courtyard.  I stay in Courtyards all the time.  This one is above average in most respects, except the parking lot is very tight and not that large (and like most hotels in the Santa Ana/Irvine/Costa Mesa area, they charge for parking).  Location is good, was only there a few hours.  Most importantly, everything worked.  It's not my favorite Santa Ana/Irvine/Costa Mesa hotel, but it's fine.
Manager Response: Dear abd1958, Thank you for your review.  We appreciate the feedback and the time that you took to share your travel experience in this area of Orange County.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future, and earning the status of being your favorite hotel near John Wayne Airport.

Summary: I stay in the Orange County hotels a couple of times a month and discovered this Courtyard. Very modern room, great inviting staff, like location and found plenty of parking on my visit.  I will be back as this is my number pick for hotel in the area for a business traveler
Manager Response: Dear Bretmn, Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Santa Ana and for taking the time to review your stay.  We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us, and thank you for sharing your experience with other travelers.  It is always our pleasure to hear from our satisfied guests, and we can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit.

Summary: I've stayed here for about 3 times.  Good service, clean spacious room, parking can be a challenge but you have a valet option. Competitive or better rate is usually found in the weekends. Right next to the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear lee p, Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments about the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We love hearing from our repeat guests, and hope we will be welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Will definitely be back! The room was beyond expectations - clean, comfortable bed, internet tv so I could watch my own Netflix account. All of the staff were professional and courteous from the valets to front desk and guest services. No complaints at all!  Wi fi is included and daily parking rates are cheaper than all other locations. This hotel is in an area used by lots of business travelers but is one of the few in this class that offers a state government rate.
Manager Response: Dear Becki- It is always a pleasure to read reviews such as yours.  It is our desire to provide excellent quality and service to every guest, and it is wonderful when we get to hear from our satisfied guests.  Thank you for leaving your detailed comments for other travelers who are headed this way.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you the next time travel brings you to Orange County.

Summary: We stayed for 3 days, very close to the beach and easy to find for not just us but our guest and the uber. I booked us 2 days ahead of time, along with updating our app feature to let them know when we'd arrive. Our family got there 2 min after expected arrival to the front desk lady immediately telling us our room is not ready, but assisting two others into theirs no problem.(We asked for an upgrade or downgrade for asap access to a room) Its one thing when its just us, but our Service dog and two children impatiently having to use the restroom and get comfortable was not ideal. Which was the idea of updating, she wasn't to pleasant or understanding. After realizing we were platinium It still didn't change her demeanor, we ended up down grading our room and were lucky to get
Manager Response: Dear brandonwood124339, Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Santa Ana and taking the time to leave your comments.  Our goal is to provide every guest with a warm welcome, and I am sorry to hear that we fell short during your check-in experience.  However, I'm delighted to know that the rest of the visit went well, and that you enjoyed the room and the rest of the visit.  We appreciate your feedback, and will be sharing with rest of the team.  We look forward to welcoming you back on future visits to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Busy weekend, busy hotel and great service
Summary: The Memorial Day weekend was very busy at the hotel, but the team took care of everyone as if they were the only guests.  This team truly cares about their guests, their work and each other.  I can't wait to come back!  Thank you Courtyard Santa Ana.
Manager Response: Dear Mike O, Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments about your recent stay at Courtyard Marriott. We hope you enjoyed a relaxing holiday weekend and had a chance to try our Bistro or any of the other amenities that the hotel has to offer.  We seeing your words of praise and enthusiasm for returning to the hotel.  We can't wait to welcome you back!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a great price.
Summary: Went to Disneyland for the weekend. Got a great rate at this hotel, very nice room, clean, front desk was very nice. Just off the hwy and easy to get to. Only issues I had was room keys didn’t work the first time so had to go back down. No biggie, I understand tech sometimes has issues. And after a long night at Disney, parking was a bit limited other than that I had a great stay and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear caseyhill3,  We're delighted that you stayed with us during your fun-filled Disney vacation.  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments.  We look forward welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Great room, great service, comfy bed. Breakfast was not free but it was good. Lots of people enjoyed the pool although I didn't have time to this visit. One thing I didn't like is that the parking is more expensive now. It would be nice if it was free like other places but it's gone up a few dollars since last year. That's the only negative, otherwise great place to stay. Never disappoints!
Manager Response: Dear Maria A, Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to leave your comments.  We're so glad that you enjoyed Breakfast in the Bistro on this visit. We hope you'll be back soon and get the chance to use our heated pool and hot tub!

Summary: Great time- nice hotel. Go visit the lovely Vanessa at the bar. She provides great drinks accompanied by a wonderful smile. —- Apparently I need 80 more characters on this review. There that should cover me.
Manager Response: Dear ktbegin, Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Santa Ana Orange County. Were so glad that you enjoyed your stay and had a chance to enjoy a drink at the Bistro Bar. We appreciate your kind comments and will be happy to welcome you back the next time you're in Orange County.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel. Clean, comfortable, convenient location
Summary: This is just your typical clean, comfortable, friendly Marriott Courtyard. Room and lobby look brand new and well kept. Bed was a little soft for my taste. Small bar area in the room includes a small fridge. No room safe however. Free Wi-Fi worked well. I have ATT and could barely get a signal unless I stood right by the window. Our room was quiet, even though it faced the street. Leaving the A/C on "Low Fan" helps drown out any outside noise. I slept fine here.  Employees were friendly and helpful. Pool area is small and not very inviting or private, right next to the hotel entrance, parking and valet area. You have to pay for parking BTW, $14 per day. Nice lobby with light snacks and bar. Breakfast that was served in the lobby (have to pay, not complimentary) looked good, but
Manager Response: Dear BeachBumChris, Thank you for your detailed comments about your stay.  I'm sure other travelers will find your comments very informative and helpful.  We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay, overall, and we hope to welcome you back on future trips to Orange County.  Thank you for choosing Courtyard Santa Ana Orange County.

Summary Heading: Conducted a half-day technical education seminar in one of the meeting rooms
Summary: Ara Genavia was a great event coordinator, providing several suggestions for catering, room set-up and audio-visual support that made the event a great success.  The location of the venue was ideal and the entire Marriott team including reception, catering, IT support, and parking exceeded our expectations.  We will certainly hold more of these events at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear halschillinger, Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback about your latest event at the Courtyard Santa Ana Orange County.  Our team enjoyed working with you and it will be my pleasure to pass your words along to Ara and the rest of the team.  We look forward to welcoming you back for future meetings.

Summary Heading: One of the best Courtyards we've stayed in!
Summary: Service, convenience, decor, staff, cleanliness and a perfect sized room with two queen beds.  Stay in many Courtyards and this was particularly nice and a very good VALUE.  Will stay again for sure on our next trip through Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear kscaa, Thank you for your business and for taking the time to leave your comments.  We  are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at this Courtyard and will proudly share your review with the rest of our team.  We look forward to welcoming you back on future stays in Orange County.

Summary Heading: Bunch of little things and one BIG negative
Summary: Got a good corporate rate, and this place was close enough to a conference.  Busy upon check in as there was a wedding happening later that night.  The guy at check in was quite nice, but rushed through everything due to being occupied with the wedding.  Normally they tell you about breakfast hours, wifi access, etc., but I was whisked away to my room with a bag of treats (silver elite member thing) in a matter of seconds it seemed.  Ok, no big deal.  Room layout in terms of watching TV from the bed was a little quirky, since the TV didn't swivel enough to get past the protruding closet.  Otherwise, everything was clean in the main area.  There was a loud buzzing noise in my room (405) right by the bed that seemed to be coming from next door my entire stay.  Bathroom was another
Manager Response: Dear James G, Thank you for taking the time to leave us your comments regarding your recent stay.  After reading through the recap of your stay, I certainly understand your frustrations and I'm so sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations on this stay. Cleanliness issues are definitely not the norm for our property and I hope that you were able to speak with a Manager about this, while you were on property. I am surprised that you were unaware of the parking fees, as they are noted on our website and on three signs within the parking lot.  Nevertheless, we appreciate the feedback and will look for additional ways to communicate  to our guests, to prevent future surprises. Thank you again for your feedback,  Safe travels!

Summary: We arrived early to our hotel, around 1pm, and there weren't any rooms immediately available so the agent helping us offered us water and coffee while we waited.  She was extremely courteous.  Our room was ready in just about 30 minutes.  We didn't wait long.  The room was clean and had everything we needed.  The Bistro downstairs has a happy hour with a full bar.  I did not expect that and was happy to have a good drink at the end of the day.  Try the Coconut Collins, it won't disappoint.  We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Mark, Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave your wonderful comments.  We're so glad that our team was able to accommodate your needs and exceed your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County,

Summary Heading: Thank you courtyard and Marriott for your hospitality
Summary: I'm a Marriott Gold and appreciate Marriott allowing me to hand in their very comfortable lobby while I wait for my family. Lot's of space, very clean, media and computers. And nice front desk. Courtyard have become a family favorite for me.
Manager Response: Dear CARainmaker, Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments.  We're so glad that you enjoyed our hotel and that Courtyard Marriott has become a family favorite.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Stayed here for the night before we headed to our villas for the week. Good location, room nice and clean.  had to pay to park.  Did find a awesome donut shop around the corner.  Would stay here again good hotel
Manager Response: Dear Gatortoe13, Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Orange County.  We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay (and a bonus for finding the donut shop!).  We hope you enjoyed your vacation and are looking forward to the next stay in Southern California. We can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Started in rm 441 which was right over MacArthur Blvd.  got moved to supposedly quieter room 357 and I can still hear loud traffic.  If you’re a light sleeper this is not for you. And now that I’m not in 4th floor the person above me has been stomping since before 5  am.  $16 to valet or $14 to self park. And why does the bathroom door have to always be Swung shut. Traveling for one I like bathroom door kept open at night and so had to use a towel stand to keep door open. My least favorite Courtyard yet and I’ve been to many.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We're so disappointed to hear that you were unhappy with your stay. It is our goal to provide a positive and memorable guest experience, and it seems as though this was not the case during your stay.  You mentioned several concerns that our team will discuss  as to determine how we can better accommodate our guests in the future. The bathroom door, as noted on the door, is a security feature that is required by OSHA code. We sincerely apologize that this was not one of your better hotel stays, but thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback.

Summary: This hotel was very clean and comfortable.  The shower had plenty of hot water and there were ample fresh towels.  All staff I interacted with was friendly and helpful. My only complaint was that the cafe did not open until seven. It would be nice to have it opened by six for early bird risers and people that have early meeting times. However, the person that was preparing to open up did bring me a cup of tea that I requested after she completed the task she was doing.
Manager Response: Dear kspast2,  Thank you for staying with us at Courtyard Santa Ana, and for taking the time to leave your comments. We're so delighted that you enjoyed the stay and will note your comments about the hours of the Bistro. It does open at 6am Monday - Friday, but a little later on the weekends based on the typical demand. I am glad to hear that the server was able to accommodate your needs. Thank you for choosing Marriott, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future

Summary: We were there for 3 nights.  Rooms were very clean and all staff very accomodating. Location allows easy access to freeway, shortening distance to beaches.  Error in billing was corrected immediately and without concerns.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana.  We hope that your time in Orange County was well spent, and that you'll be back again soon.  We'll be here to welcome you back!

Summary Heading: Fantastic staff and hotel - not best location for restaurants
Summary: I cannot say a bad thing about the hotel - staff, rooms, location, etc.  Only thing I would say is it is not close to restaurants like others mentioned.  I do not mind walking, but was very difficult to find something to sit at a bar and enjoy a few drinks and food.  I ended up going to the DoubleTree :).  However I would still stay here when had a trip near John Wayne
Manager Response: Dear Rick H,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your kind feedback about our hotel.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back in the future ( and point  you in the direction of some of our favorite local bars and eateries). We love reading reviews like yours and it will be my pleasure to share this with the rest of the Team.

Summary Heading: Just lovely staff and a great experience..
Summary: We stay at this Hotel for any of our trips that rea within 1hr rather than choose a Hotel closer.  The Hotel itself is well maintained and it is clean and tidy.  The staff are a delight and nothing id a problem.   The hotel maids are very quiet and courteous and never shout up and down the corridor as in other Hotels we have stayed in.  I have stayed in about 30 nights a year for about for 4 years.   My only grumble is that it costs $16.00 to park your car which I think is unfair.
Manager Response: Dear Bill,  Thank you for being a loyal guest of the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We sincerely appreciate your business and thank you for taking the time to leave your kind comments.  We are proud to be your preferred hotel when traveling to this area, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at the Marriott. Very nice cozy room, heated outdoor pool, nice size jacuzzi, decently equipped gym, very friendly and helpful staff. The location was within walking distance of good eatery's.
Manager Response: Dear Thomas, Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  It was our pleasure to welcome you and we're so glad that you enjoyed the cozy room, and all of the hotel amenities.  We hope that you'll be back to say again soon.

Summary Heading: Good choice near John Wayne Airport
Summary: There are a bunch of options near John Wayne Airport. This is a good one. I continued to be impressed by what the Courtyards are able to put together for a menu in their Bistro. Not fancy, but better food than you might expect, a good enough selection, and pleasant space in and around their lobby. I think it's just right for a quick dinner on a business trip.
Manager Response: Dear RobBlue, Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard Santa Ana, and for taking the time to leave your comments.  We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and particularly the Bistro.  We just updated to the Bistro 2.0 menu in December and hope you had a chance to try some of our offerings.  We hope to see you again, on your next visit to the John Wayne Airport area.

Summary: Didn't have any problem during our short stay, but also it was very forgettable too.  Problem is that most hotels around are way too much overpriced. So if you want to spend the night in a safe place, this can be one option.
Manager Response: Dear draghignazzo,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel, but please accept our apologies for not exceeding your expectations during your short stay.  Our goal is to provide a memorable experience and we hope to have an opportunity to do just that the next time your travels bring you to this area.  Kind Regards,  Marjorie C.

Summary: Marriott has a reputation for nice, clean room comfortably decorated. This hotel continues that expectation and delivers a great experience for this weary traveler. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Totally recommend this location!
Manager Response: Dear CrystalGWilliam, Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Santa Ana and for taking the time to leave your kind remarks.  We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay and that it lived up to your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back on future stays in Santa Ana.

Summary Heading: Courtyard Santa Ana - Very Good Experience
Summary: We came in for a short Christmas Trip with the grandkids.  This Courtyard is nicely updated and the room met all of our needs.  The bathroom was well appointed; the wi-fi and AV were all working well with a good selection of channels on the TV.  We were especially pleased with the service - the doorman's (Scott) greeting, the front desk (Luziel) at all hours of the day, the bistro attendant - we felt welcome and valued as customers.  The location is really a plus with easy access to Hwy 55, the 405 & 73 toll road.  In addition, it was no problem exiting the hotel with a low-traffic access road going out to busy MacArthur Blvd.  The rooms were quiet with no overflow of sound from other rooms.  The daily housekeeping was thorough. We are also Marriott Rewards members so the
Manager Response: Dear Katherine, Thank you for choosing to spend your holiday with us at Courtyard Santa Ana.  It was our pleasure to welcome you and your family and we're so glad that you all enjoyed your vacation.  It will be my pleasure to share your comments with Scott and Luziel, as well as the rest of the team.  We appreciate your Marriott loyalty and the time that you took to write such a kind and detailed review.  Happy New Year!

Summary: Just a short business three day trip to Santa Ana. The room was large enough for me and service was good.  The hotel staff was also very friendly and helpful. Would stay there again if I am in the area again.
Manager Response: Dear Clint, We're  happy to hear that our helpful staff made you 3 day trip to Santa Ana pleasant and comfortable.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope you'll be back in the area again, soon.

Summary: The location was very accommodating to a few requested. I needed to have a ride to the Airport on a Saturday to pick up lost luggage. They reimbursed for the Uber trip with out question. Also the room was great. Maid staff was friendly and Happy to help with a few extra items I needed. All the amenities where nice. Room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Ken L, We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our friendly team members were able to accommodate your requests.  It was our pleasure to assist during your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My stay here was extremely pleasant.  From the courteous front desk staff to the very nice shuttle driver, I couldn't have been happier.  Room was very spacious and the whole hotel was amazingly clean! Very convenient to the airport, highways and food.  I even took a quick Uber to South Coast Plaza on some down time.  Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Mairin03, We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and even had a little time to explore the neighboring area. Thank you for sharing your comments with us and please come stay again, soon.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean rooms and very good service
Summary: Customer service was top notch, we stayed here for 5 days. Our room was very clean and spacious. The staff very friendly and room rates were reasonable. The bistro had assortment of snacks and sandwiches for a good price. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Hani G,  Thank you for staying with us at Courtyard Santa Ana.  We appreciate your nice comments and look forward to sharing your review with the rest of the Team.  Enjoy the holidays and we will look forward to welcoming you the back on your return to Santa Ana.

Summary: Staff is friendly. Hotel is quiet. Only piece of frustration was the rooms A/C did not work as well as I would have hoped - just a small frustration that can be common with hotels. I was only in the area for 24 hours - this hotel was perfect for a quick stay.
Manager Response: Dear Joshroche,  Thank you for choosing the Courtyard Santa Ana.  I'm sorry to hear about your frustration with the AC . Hopefully you brought it to a team member's attention so we service it for you.  In all, it sounds like you had a great stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I am a very loyal Marriott brand guest - about 500 nights. I would never go to this hotel again. There is mold in the shower. I was surprised to find out at check in that I had to pay for parking. The supposed "upgrade" I should have had didn't happen. Check in was almost robotic.
Manager Response: Dear TJC22,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  As cleanliness and service are our top priorities, I was disappointed to read your comments.  Please accept our sincere apologies for failing to meet your - and our own - expectations.  If you would be so kind, we would like the opportunity to learn more about your stay.  Please feel free to contact me directly so we can resolve these issues for you.  We hope to have an opportunity to serve you again!  Kind Regards,  Marjorie

Summary Heading: When you just need a place to stay.
Summary: We spent the night here due to the Anaheim Hills fire and were so glad we did. Quiet comfortable food, easy light meal service, friendly and helpful staff. The locationa is central to most of Orange County and if we had wanted to dine elsewhere there are pleanty of choices within a short walk.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for staying with us at Courtyard Santa Ana and for taking the time to review your stay.  We're so sorry for the scary situation that forced you to evacuate, but so glad to hear that you were able to enjoy your stay and had everything you needed to rest for the night.  Should you ever need a centrally located hotel, close to home, we hope that you'll stay with us again.

Summary: Great location, close to major freeways, airport, dining and shopping.  Wish the Bistro (restaurant) was open longer - very limited hours.  Spacious room.  Not a saleable location - easy navigation via car.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for choosing the Courtyard Santa Ana as your safe place during stressful situation. We're so sorry that you went through some scary moments, but hope your stay with us was comfortable.  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us.  Should you ever need a hotel close to home, we hope that you'll return to stay with us at Courtyard Santa Ana.

Summary: Vanessa Pham, bartender extraordinaire, is AWESOME!! I've been staying at this Courtyard since 2014. Vanessa's attention to detail and solid customer service is 2nd to none!! Rooms are updated and clean. Love my home away from home.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  It is such a thrill when one of our guests takes the time to mention the amazing service of a specific team member.  We are happy to hear the Vanessa has enhanced your experience and it will be our pleasure to share your comments with her.  Thank you for your staying with us at Courtyard Santa Ana.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: The Hotel was clean and convenient and the staff was very helpful. I miss having a bathtub and I wish that the Bistro was open all day not just for breakfast and dinner.  There are several nice Restaurants and Starbuck within an easy walk though.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding  your recent stay at Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your overall stay, and thank you for the comments.  We understand that preference for a room with a bathtub, and we do have options of rooms with tubs or with glass showers.  I'm sorry that was not presented to you at check-in, but feel free to state your preference at check-in when you stay with us again. I will speak with our team so that we do a better job of explaining this during future check-ins. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back on future visits.

Summary: I was conducting business meetings in Los Angeles and Orange County. This was a perfect hotel to stay for a quick overnight stay while away on business. The rooms are incredibly spacious and beds are comfortable. My only complaint is that the floors are quite thin, every time the person in the room above me walked around I heard loud creaking, this made it difficult to fall asleep. The front desk agent was extremely friendly and the food in the cafe was delicious for breakfast!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana, and found our location to be convenient to your business in both Orange County and Los Angeles.  We always appreciate receiving guest feedback and continue to look for ways to improve our guests' experiences.  We thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, close to airport and restaurants
Summary: I had 2 days of meeting in Irvine and stayed at the Courtyard. It is a typical Courtyard with are pretty much always good. The pool looked nice (I didn't use). The location is great. Across the street from Starbucks, restaurants and more. The free hotel shuttle got meet the airport in about 5 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Courtyard Santa Ana.  It's our goal to provide every guest with a positive and memorable experience, and it's always nice to hear from our satisfied guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: A great stay with a great staff!
Summary: The staff is wonderful and drawing exception in this review is Vanessa and Tony at the Bistro. Exceptional customer service and lovely smiles. They are a fine example of what makes the customer experience exceptional.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Traveler, We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana.  Thank you for your kind words towards Tony and Vanessa as it will be my pleasure to share this feedback with them and the rest of the team.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town.

Summary: The staff here are amazing and deliver awesome customer service.  Vanessa and Tony at the Bistro are great.  Andrew at the front desk smiles non-stop.  Robert Lee and the valets are so friendly and always remember my name.  The location is also very convenient to anything you want to do in Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Traveler, We thank you for taking the time to leave such a kind review of the Courtyard Santa Ana and mentioning some of our awesome staff by name.  It is always a thrill to share these reviews with the team and we appreciate the time that you took to mention them.  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Best Marriott Courtyard in Orange County, Consistently
Summary: This is our second stay in the last 4 months at this Courtyard.  First off, we're Marriott Rewards members and made the decision, a long time ago, that Marriott offers the most consistent excellence in the hotel, motel field, around the U.S.A.  So for us, a Marriott is a no brainer.  Next, using the Marriott site, find the least expensive.  $30-40 difference between a lovely Courtyard in Irvine, by SNA, and a bit less lovely Courtyard pair in Anaheim and the Disneyland area.  We're in our automobile and my wife uses a cane and a walker, so disability access is important.  Adjacent to the 55, with disability space next to our great room 124 at the southeast corner of the hotel, at the best price, and with access to the 405, brand-wise, price-wise, and convenient!  The first stay
Manager Response: Dear tinkll1,  What a lovely and thoughtful review!  Thank you so much for taking the time to describe your experience for future guests and inform them of the service and amenities they can expect.  We are thrilled we were able to accommodate your needs and ensure you enjoyed your recent stays.  We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Only overnight stay but was pleasantly surprised
Summary: We only stayed for 1 night but were very pleased with the hotel and the cleanliness.  Great place to head out from with plenty of places to visit - OC Fair, Irvine, South Coast Plaza, Laguna are all within a rather short car ride.  Hotel staff were very pleasant and accommodating.    Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Traveler, Thank you for reviewing your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're so glad that you enjoyed the hotel and hope you'll be back again and have the opportunity to stay a little longer on the next visit.  Have a wonderful day.

Summary: I am on a project that brings me to the OC every week for the next six months.  Having stayed at 4 other Marriott Properties in the first 4 weeks of the project I can say this one is by FAR the best!  I was looking for the hotel I would call home week after week and this is finally it.  The hotel is clean, updated, and well appointed.  The rooms are spacious and have everything you need.  The staff is fantastic and courteous, especially the wonderful Front Office Manager Jane!  They will go out of their way to make sure you are taken care of.  Outdoor heated pool and the onsite bar and restaurant is very convenient.  Don't hesitate to book.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Dirk H, We are so delighted to know that you are enjoying your time with us.  we know that being away from home so much must be exhausting at times, and it our goal to make your stay as comfortable as possible.  It will be my pleasure to share your comments with Jane and the rest of her team.  Please don't hesitate to ask if there is anything we can do to improve your visit.

Summary: Can't say anything bad about this place,friendly staff,safe location &clean.would stay here again. Very clean with nice room modern style feel to it.lots of space to sit and enjoy the weather.we were able to print our tickets there which was very helpful
Manager Response: Dear Valued Traveler,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay of Courtyard Santa Ana.  It is our pleasure to provide you with top quality service and memorabl experience.  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon.
