Summary: The hotel is closer to a 2 star than a 3 I would say. The room was clean and comfortable. However, we did notice that they have cut back on basics, even a shower cap! The outside carpets(I don't know why they need it in the Elevator) was very dirty. They were cleaning the carpets in the passages but didn't do the Elevator!  We leave the room first thing in the morning and return late afternoon. It was not serviced even after 4! We asked for the room to be cleaned, and she put wet pillow cases on the pillows! Surely, she would have felt that it was wet. Not a nice stay.... considering the rate it's not worth at all.
Manager Response: Dear TravelerC55,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel and inform us about your stay.  As the cleanliness of our hotel is one of our top priorities, I was disappointed to hear that we did not live up to your - or our own - expectations.  Rest assured, your comments regarding the elevator and poor room servicing have been shared with our team to help improve our service moving forward.  We hope to have an opportunity to better serve you the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Kind Regards,  Marjorie C.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel for the business traveller
Summary: I was in the area for 3 nights and then had to extend another night. It was a great 4 days stay at the Courtyard Marriott. Checking in was a breeze. Parking is a bit of squeeze and you have to pay for it - but it is consistent with everywhere else in the area.  The room was clean and organized. Lots of electrical outlets which is very important to me to charge all my devices. The Bistro is very convenient to grab coffee and breakfast in the morning. Their market was also very helpful since I needed some pain medicine one morning and they carried it.   The strip mall across the street has 4-5 ethnic restaurants - so grabbing a quick bite for dinner is very easy. Close access to freeways - the Santa Ana airport is literally 4-7 minute drive away.  I used the gym one day which was
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking the time to comments and give such a thorough review of the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're so glad that our hotel met your travel needs and I'm sure other travelers will benefit from your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in Orange County.

Summary: The location is superb. Really close to the OC airport (SNA) without getting all the flight noise.  At a major intersection allowing quick access to major roads and freeways. The property is very well taken care of and the staff is very caring from the moment you drive up or walk in until wave good bye again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We're so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and our wonderful staff.  It is our goal to leave every guest with a positive and memorable experience, and it's nice to know when we've succeeded.  I will be happy to share your comments with the rest of our team.  Thank you for taking the time to comment and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great location for a business hotel
Summary: Hotel is at a nice location. Convenient to 55,405 intersection. Shopping is close by. Price/value is great comparing to other hotels close by. As a plus, there is Starbucks coffee. Overnite parking is usually not an issue, unless there is an event going on. The only downside is the noise. I can hear people walking upstairs as well as kids crying. So bring your earbuds. Good customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the feedback and the thorough review of your experience at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're delighted that we offer many features and amenities that fit your travel needs. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: The Courtyard in Santa Ana is my goto hotel when staying over in Irvine for business.  The property is modern, clean and convenviently located.  There is also onsite parking for a reasonable fee.  The staff is very pleasant and helpful.  Although though there are several eating choices within walking distance, the Bistro in the lobby is an easy choice with fresh salads and a full bar.   I particularly appreciate the morning espresso!
Manager Response: Dear Loyal Guest, We sincerely appreciate your detailed review of Courtyard Santa Ana.  It is our pleasure to offer comfort and service when you're staying for business, and we're so glad that you enjoy the many amenities and conveniences that we have to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I have been staying here for almost 2 years off and on.  Great place with great people.  If you work in Irvine you cant do better and the bistro is good.  Rooms are quiet and look very nice.  There are several eating places within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear GPSMike, Thank you for taking the time to leave you feedback regarding Courtyard Santa Ana.  We thank you for your loyalty and repeat business! It's our pleasure to offer you a great location with all of the service and amenities that you need when traveling to the Irvine area. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel but everything is extra
Summary: The hotel is beautiful and the staff was pretty good. The rate seemed reasonable until you paid for parking and breakfast. Fortunately there was a big sign on the bottle of water in the room letting you know it was $5 if you used it.   The room was very comfortable but the doors were very heavy so it seemed like everyone was slamming their door when they came in or went out. Unfortunately we had noisy people on our floor that were going from room to room and a child that seemed to be running up and down the hall. We didn't complain but the people below us did and the front desk called our room just before midnight to ask if all was okay because the people on the floor below said we were stomping our feet. Since we had been in bed for the past 2 hours and had finally fallen
Manager Response: Dear Pam H, Thank you for your detailed review and feedback of your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana. I'm glad that you enjoyed our beautiful hotel and found the rooms to be comfortable.  I do apologize for the noise issues that you encountered and the late night phone call. I understand how frustrating that must have been and I have shared your comments with the rest of the staff so that we use better problem solving methods in the future.  We sincerely appreciate you business and do hope you'll return the next time you travel to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Best Experience near John Wayne Airport/Orange County
Summary: Let me say that I am Marriot Executive Platnium so I stay at a lot of Marriott properties. At first glance this looks like a typical airport Marriott Courtyard hotel. However the staff was the most helpful, and courteous that I have found at any hotel. It was clean, the pool area was well-kept, the gym was decent and provided lots of room for weights workouts, the bistro service was quick with great presentation. My room did not face the street so I did not have traffic noise, but I has pool noise till it closed. There are several places to eat within a 5 minute walk. A Starbucks is across the street and a convenience store/gas stop on the next corner. If you drive toward town you will find much more. On the weekend, they do not have an airport shuttle which I had counted on. So
Manager Response: Dear BetCox, Wow!  We're so proud to have earned such a raving review.  Our team puts quality and service above all else, and I will be thrilled to let our team know that their efforts were recognized during your stay. We truly thank you for taking the time to share your experience with other travelers and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County/

Summary: I had a short stay at Courtyard by Marriott during Dec'2016. Clean and quiet place to stay. It has got couple of eating joints right across the street. John Wayne airport is hardly couple of minutes away.
Manager Response: Dear Praveen_Pawar,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're so glad that you found the hotel to be clean and quiet. I hope you were able to take advantage of some of the delicious and convenient eateries nearby.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Santa Ana.

Summary: I stay at a lot of Marriott properties. This is a good one; clean, comfortable and safe. Nicely situated in the LA area conveniently located adjacent to major freeways but quiet. I've stayed here 2-3 times now and their service is always top-notch. Everyone is friendly and helpful. Uber is on the spot in less than 5 minutes. Very nice. Starbucks and a couple of eating places for a quick bite are just across the street.
Manager Response: Dear ChangeAdvisor, Thank you for reviewing your stay with us at Courtyard Santa Ana. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your stay and found this hotel to be "a good one."  We appreciate your return business and your thorough review of the hotel and the surrounding area.   We look forward to welcoming you back on your next stay.

Summary Heading: Outstanding hotel, great service, rooms and location
Summary: This is the first time I had stayed at this hotel and the location could not be better. The John Wayne airport is only 5 minutes away! The customer service was very good and the staff was all very nice! The rooms are extremely clean and spacious. Although they serve Starbucks coffee here, the nice part is there is a Starbucks across the street, a 30 second walk way! It is a very convenient for business as well as for family. The small strip mall across the street is convenient if you want to get a change of food from their bistro as it has a few small restaurants to choose from.
Manager Response: Dear 12YearTravels,  Thank you for your thorough review of your recent stay at Courtyard Santa Ana. We're thrilled that you enjoyed the stay and found that our staff to be friendly, rooms to be spacious, and vicinity to Starbucks convenient. It sounds like you had a chance to enjoy our Bistro as well as some of the other food options nearby. We do hope that you'll be back to stay again soon.

Summary: Finally, a decent Marriott property! After a string of crappy, dirty, outdated Courtyards, I finally found a clean and friendly one. While the check-in desk clerk was just weird, when I checked out early in the morning, the overnight desk clerk was friendly and helpful. However, while this property does offer an airport shuttle, it does not start until 0500. This sucks if you have an early flight.
Manager Response: Dear Flyairdave  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed our clean and updated property. I apologize that the shuttle schedule didn't meet your needs on this trip, but hope you'll be back to stay with us in the future.

Summary: Was just an overnight trip and the facility was conveniently located next to the airport. The staff was very cordial, the facility was very clean and bright.  The room was one of the best I have ever stayed in.  The Bistro was nice but had a very limited menu.  The one thing I did not like was that they charged to park your vehicle over night.
Manager Response: Dear louhinaz, Thank you for your review of the Courtyard Santa Ana. We are glad to hear that the close proximity to the airport and the sleeping room quality all met your needs.  It makes our team so proud to hear that the room was "on of the best" that you've stayed in.  We're sorry to hear about the family loss, and hope you're able to return under happier conditions in the future.

Summary: Stayed at the Courtyard Santa Ana Orange County for two nights in May 2017 for business.  Location was quite easy to access from the freeway.  Was pleased with how new the property seemed.  Nice proximity to a row of casual restaurants across the street.  Also liked that it is in a safe, albeit sterile area that is fairly quiet when not business hours: nice neighborhood and park to jog in nearby as well.  Parking seemed like it would be a pain, but did not end up being a problem in the end.  Adequate workout area as well.  Wish it had free breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear clay512017, Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana.  I'm sure other travelers will benefit from your feedback regarding our convenient location, and nearby restaurants and recreation.  While COurtyards typically do no offer free breakfast, we hope that you were able to enjoy the morning and/or evening offerings at our Bistro.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: We are big fans of the Marriott chain. But on this trip, things didn't work out well for us. The toilet was stopped up when we checked in. We notified the front desk, and we were told someone would be right up to fix it. Well, it was a couple of hours before maintenance arrived, and we were in the room eating dinner. When asked if they could come back after we finished eating, their answer was NO. So, you get the picture. Big smelly cloud took over the room, and dinner went in the trash can.
Manager Response: Dear hoosierdawgs,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay.  I sincerely apologize for the maintenance issue and the service response that you encountered.  This is certainly not the norm for our hotel and I will be following up with the Managers to ensure that improvements are made. I understand how this situation could have tainted your experience and I hope that you were still able to enjoy the overall visit.

Summary: The hotel staff has a very high customer service IQ.  I only had a short stay at the hotel, which was very convenient for a business meeting.   I interacted with the staff three times (check-in, bistro, check-out) and each time someone did something that exceeded my expectation.  Next time I'm in Santa Ana, I will definitely stay at this Courtyard.
Manager Response: Dear djdandurand, We sincerely thank you for taking the time to review the Courtyard Santa Ana. It is our goal to go above and beyond to exceed guest expectations.  You have truly made our day by letting us know about your experience and service interactions.  I will be happy to share your words with our staff and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: From check in to check out staff was very helpful and friendly. And besides that GREAT cookies. Nice clean rooms. Easy to find close to airport. On my first day my business was done early. I called to find out if I could check in a little earlier than normal. Not sure being a platinum Honors member helped but was told they had a room. It was great to be able to enjoy my room early. A little tricky to get to the entrance off of the 405 but like it. Nice breakfast. Good food and great staff.
Manager Response: Dear Donald H,  Thank you for your kind feedback.  It will be my pleasure to share your words with the staff.  We are always happy to know that we were able to accommodate our guest's special requests.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Excellent hotel and staff.  Very clean and modern with a great location in SoCal, close to several nice restaurants and John Wayne Airport.  All of the rooms are well kept and in good shape, very clean and well stocked.  Bistro restaurant is convenient for a quick meal.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey D,  We are so pleased you enjoyed your convention trip while at our Courtyard Marriott in Santa Ana.  We will pass along your kind comments to the rest of the team and please visit again soon!

Summary: The Courtyard Santa Ana is a wonderful place to stay, clean, bright, excellent.  The front desk folks allowed me to check in a bit early and met my every need.  I highly recommend the place--close to John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Dear JDPearring,  We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to write such a kind review of our hotel, the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County.  It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to see you again!

Summary: We chose this hotel due to the proximity to the Segerstrom Concert Hall and the reasonable price for our needs. We requested an early check-in and as a Marriott Elite Member we were accorded the request. The room was was large and had a sofa along with typical Courtyard amenities.  We particularly found the valet staff very pleasant and it was worth the extra couple of dollars over self-park.
Manager Response: Dear ZZMimi,  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  I am so glad you were able to check-in early and stay so near your concert venue.  We have shared your feedback with the Valet team and they join me in expressing their appreciation.   Please come visit again soon!

Summary: Clean and comfortable rooms.  Easy access parking and well manicured property. Street noise was an issue. Windows could use more soundproofing. Restaurants and shopping complexes are not within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Wcunial,  Thank you for your review ad for providing such thorough information for future guests. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed the rooms and our neat and clean property. I apologize that street noise was an issue for you and hope you had the opportunity to stop by the Front Desk to request ear plugs if needed. You are correct that there is not shopping within walking distance, but I hope our friendly staff let you know about the restaurants within walking distance. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay and please come back and visit again soon.

Summary: Just spent six nights here, very good stay. Jane and her colleague greeted us at check in, they were welcoming, professional and polite. After getting to our room, I noticed an annoying vibration sound, it didn't bother my young son, but it drove me crazy. I called the front desk, and Jane arrived in minutes with 2 new room choices to show us. And again,  very courteous and helpful.  Over the next 6 days we interacted with many of the staff. Everyone from the morning coffee bar woman,  to the maintenance guys, the rotating front desk staff, parking guys, housekeeping and the evening bar/counter servers were all friendly, helpful and seemed genuinely happy to work here.  Pluses for this hotel for us were: Location/value. Minutes from Santa Ana airport, Newport, and Huntington
Manager Response: Dear MeAroundTown,  Thank you for your kind words about the hotel, particularly for Jane and her team. We know that staying in a hotel for an extended period can be hard, so it is nice to hear that the staff and the amenities made you feel a bit more at home. Thank you for letting Jane know when there was something not quite right about your room.  We appreciate the opportunity to make things right and ensure that you have the best stay possible. We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana, and we hope you will return soon.

Summary: I had an early departure out of John Wayne Airport and was looking for a place that had a bar, restaurant, shuttle to airport and predictable quality.  This Marriott is all of these and then some.  We called as we were nearing the rental car return for the shuttle to pick us up and he was there waiting for us.  Every single member of the staff was cheerful and helpful in taking care of us.  The bistro had great food and good wine selection.  The entire hotel was clean and in great shape.  The beds in Marriotts are second to none!  Had a great nights sleep and the shuttle had us to the airport in 5 minutes!  I absolutely recommend this Hôtel.
Manager Response: Dear Jay F,  It is our thrill to hear that the Courtyard Santa Ana had everything you were looking for in Orange County, Airport hotel, and that you were able to make the most out of all of our amentities. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in Orange County.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel and not that far from Disney Land. It is in a area that is not that packed and many places to eat at. The staff are great people and the rooms are in good shape. You have free parking and easy to go to many places from this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Atlanta776, Thank you for taking the time to tell other travelers about your stay here at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're glad that you found the location to be ideal for your Disney trip and local eateries. We do actually charge for parking, as do the other hotels in this area. Should you be returning to this hotel, signage will direct you to the correct parking areas so that you avoid the possibility of being towed. We look forward to welcoming you  back soon!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel close to the airport
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 1 night. Room was clean and everything works well. Wifi was pretty fast . The only issue was the heating system ( very noisy). Breakfast was OK and staff was really friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Giogio42, Thank you for taking the time to review your positive experience at the Courtyard Santa Ana. I am sorry to hear that there were issued with the heating system ad hope you reported that to management so that we had the opportunity to fix it. We take great pride in our service  here and it's my pleasure to share your comments with our team.  Please come visit us again, soon.

Summary: Hotel staff was very friendly, check in was very efficient, but the walls were too thin, we could hear our neighbors. The location was good and the parking was OK even though they charge 9.00 per day to park.  Overall good experience for a 1 night stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jill L,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Santa Ana.  We're glad to hear that the service and location met your needs.  I am disappointed to hear that noise from the other rooms disturbed your stay and I willll present your feedback to management.  We do hope that you'll stay with us again, the next time travel brings you to Orange County.

Summary: I stayed at the Courtyard Marriott for a week while on business in the area. First they accommodated me immediately with a room even though I arrived mid morning. The room was spacious and clean. I was able to get something to eat in the evenings from the bar/restaurant and the food was good quality. The staff was courteous at all times. The location of the hotel is near a few affordable restaurants for breakfast, lunch and dinner. I had an enjoyable stay at the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Kenneth M,  Thank you for your wonderful review!  We're so glad that you enjoyed the Courtyard Santa Ana as your home away from home while on business in the area and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Hotel check in staff were very friendly, accommodating and helpful.  We had a problem with a noisy neighbor and they tried troubleshooting right away.  They switched our room the next day.  Having been in 2 rooms in 3 nights, we could see improvements in the following areas:  shower head pressure and spread is bad.  You can feel the springs in the mattresses so back and neck was a bit sore for 2 days.  Tip: try to ask for a room away from MacArthur Blvd, if it's an option.  Rooms facing that street is extremely noisy.  I had a hard time falling and staying asleep due to loud car passing, stopping at light and revving engine.
Manager Response: Dear Beaxplorer, Thank you for your valuable feedback.  It is our goal to provide the best service ad quality for our travelers, and we are always disappointed to hear when we missed the mark. I am glad to hear that the staff did their best to solve your problem, and I hope that you reported the shower issue to an employee so that we could have Maintenance make any needed improvements.  Overall, we will use your review to work on ways to make improvements so that your next stay will be all Ups!

Summary: Janelle, Juan, Irene, and team could not have been more on their game in helping me scramble to settle logistics for a last minute meeting venue change! Y'all were a lifesaver! 100% recommend. I don't think I've ever had support like this before.
Manager Response: Dear davidwalexander2017,  Thank you for your kinds words regarding our team!  We know how stressful last minute meetings can be, and it was our pleasure to jump in and help you out.  It was so kind of you to think of leaving this review in the midst of everything else that you had going on.  We hope to have the opportunity to work with you again soon.

Summary: I stay at A LOT of Courtyards across the country and this is one of the nicer properties I have stayed at.  Huge Fitness Center, very close to several highways and SNA airport.  Good healthy food options across the street.  If you are a Marriott person, this is the best option in the area.
Manager Response: Dear jwbfromMA,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Courtyard Santa Ana.  I'm sure other travelers will find your review to be very helpful and we are grateful for the feedback. Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Average hotel but book w/ caution
Summary: Average hotel but my room was in poor condition....carpet needed replaced (some gross stains- room 321) with a few other marks on walls, dirty fridge, etc.  Be aware that many of the rooms are right next to a street that can get very busy...a couple noisy cars and motorcycles woke me up each night of my 3 nights stay. For $200+ plus a night as a Marriott Platinum lifetime member I would have hoped I would have been given a cleaner room in a better location in the hotel. At checkin I guess I didn't appear worthy to them.   Overall the hotel was very average with a larger than normal gym for a simple 3 star hotel. Staff seemed friendly enough but I'm unsure if they've been trained appropriately based on my experience with my room.
Manager Response: Dear Ville4three,  Thank you for taking the time to provide this detailed feedback regarding your recent stay.  Please accept our deepest apologies for the cleanliness and noise issues you experienced, not to mention that you did not feel appreciated for your loyalty to Marriott.  Rest assured, this is not the standard at our hotel and we sincerely hope to have an opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Thank you again for your comments and please let us know if we can ever be of assistance.

Summary: We stayed for one night before flying home.  We used points for a free night.  It was comfortable...probably one of the best hotel showers, and towels were awesome too.  The only reason I give it 4...elevator was truly the slowest ever (we were on 4th floor so a pain to walk up), and the street noise was pretty loud.  We were able to walk to our dinner after arrival...there were many options within walking distance.  The photo is the view from my room...which would explain the street noise.  Literally on the road.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed our showers and cozy towels, and that our location was convenient to your dining needs. I apologize for the issue with the elevator and thank you for the feedback.  We will pass it on to our Maintenance department and look for opportunities to serve our guests better in the future.

Summary: This was my first time staying at a courtyard. It was a nice experience. The staff was helpful and accommodating after we arrived super late due to a flight delay.  The room was very nice and there were food options although, I found the hours to be inconvenient. Only thing I didn't like was that the shuttle didn't run on the weekends. They did say they would reimburse you for a taxi cab though.
Manager Response: Dear TaylorBrione,  Thank you for your kind review of the Courtyard Santa Ana.  I'm glad that your first Courtyard experience was a nice one and that the staff and room met all of your travel needs. I do apologize that our Bistro hours were not convenient to your needs, though I hope you were able to take advantage to the convenient eateries within walking distance. We hope that you'll return to the hotel the next time travel brings you to Orange County.

Summary: Staff was extremely helpful & courteous. The folks in housekeeping, the bellman, & at the front desk were fabulous. Staff who helped set-up our conference weren't really visible, but were clearly doing a great job behind the scenes.   I do wish the hotel had longer hours for food service. Also, as a Rewards member, I was disappointed to be charged so much for high-speed WiFi & parking.   Thanks for the great service & clean, comfortable rooms though!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer P,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay and event at Courtyard Santa Ana. It is always our goal to offer excellent guest service in all areas of the hotel, and it is our thrill to receive positive reviews regarding the staff. I apologize that the Bistro's hours did not fully satisfy the needs of the group and that you were disappointed in the charges for Wifi and parking. We do offer a complimentary wifi option and parking fees are in line with (if not less than) similar hotels in the neighborhood.  We hope your group enjoyed their event and we hope you'll visit again.

Summary: We just took a trip to Southern California & decided to stay at the Marriott Courtyard, in Santa Ana.  The location is good.  The room is very clean (fresh air), and the services are nice.  We were very happy staying there.  The price is good too.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  We hope you enjoyed your trip to Southern California and are glad to hear that the location, room, and hotel services all met your needs. Please stay with us again the next time you're in the area.

Summary Heading: Convenience, Comfort, and a Real Gym
Summary: Well done Courtyard Santa Ana.  The lobby is cozy and bright with plenty of  seating, and a cafe that is open for breakfast and evening bites. An outdoor area with lounge seating offers a nice touch for soaking up some California sunshine.  The staff is attentive and super engaging. Someone, somewhere has placed an emphasis on customer service and it shows. Front desk agents greet arriving guests, housekeeping says "hello," as they make the grounds. Everyone warm and friendly.  As a road warrior, traveling salesmen, it's the little touches that make all the difference when setting up shop for a few  days. A smiling face, my coffee made the way I order it. Little things. Big impact. Makes me feel a little less worn from the road and a bit more at home.  My favorite part about
Manager Response: Dear Jaime K,  Thank you for your taking the time to write such a thoughtful review of our hotel, and a useful review for our future guests.  It will be my pleasure to share your words with the rest of the staff  and let them know that their efforts were noticed and appreciated. I hope you will visit us again the next time you are visiting the Courtyard Santa Ana.

Summary: This hotel was great in every respect except having to pay for parking & high-speed internet.  The hotel was clean, rooms were spacious and comfortable, staff was very friendly.  I would stay here again if returning to this area, but would probably look for a place that had free parking.  I didn't use the wifi, but saw that there was a charge of $5.95/day to upgrade to high-speed.? What?.  It's possible I would have to pay a higher nightly rate somewhere else in order to get complimentary parking & free high-speed internet, but I hate being nickel & dimed.
Manager Response: Dear elviraModesto,  Thank you for your review of Courtyard Santa Ana. We are glad that you found the hotel clean, comfortable, and friendly and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in Orange County.  In regards to parking, I believe you will find that the majority of similar hotels in this neighborhood, and as you get closer to the airport, do charge for parking and can range from $9 (our hotel) all the way to $30 per night.  Wifi is complimentary throughout our hotel, but there is an upcharge to purchase more bandwidth that may be required for streaming movies and using multiple devices.  Most guests find that our complimentary wifi is adequate for most browsing sessions. Thank you again for taking the time to review us.

Summary Heading: Clean, fresh room! But old mattresses...
Summary: I attended a conference in the area and I stayed here for one night. There were plenty of parking spaces and my car was safe overnight. The person at the front desk told me they had 24 hour monitoring for the parking lot, which put me at ease. The staff I encountered were very nice, friendly, informative, and professional. My room was on the 3rd floor and as I walked in, the room smelled so clean and fresh, as if the windows were open letting fresh air in all day. It smelled wonderful! I was pleasantly surprised at how perfectly clean the room and bathroom were! Super clean floors, linens, shower, toilet, sink/counter, and everything was just immaculate! It was a cold night but the heater worked very well, it was a bit loud but it helped keep me warm. My ONLY complaint is the
Manager Response: Dear Manda2003,  Thank you for your detailed review.  We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel.  We take pride in the quality and cleanliness that we provide and it's nice to hear that our guests are noticing. I do apologize that the mattress and pillows didn't satisfy your preferences.  I will pass your feedback on to our Management team. W hope to see you back here in the future!

Summary: I stayed here for two nights in February 2017.  The location is very well situated for access to John Wayne airport, and the shuttle was on time. It took about 10 minutes to get to the airport at 7am on a Thursday.  (By the way, I love SNA - John Wayne airport.  Small enough to be navigable, large enough to have lots of direct flights.)   Room was clean and seemed in good repair.  Loved the walk-in shower, which was brightly lit and very clean.  Slept well on the firm but comfy bed.    Bistro breakfast was tasty and well-cooked.  I also was happy to see a lively crowd of folks there for happy hour in the evening.    Staff very friendly and courteous.    Parking was available and seemed plentiful, although I didn't need it.    Starbucks across the street.  South Coast mall not
Manager Response: Dear Amyemilia,  Thank you for your very thorough review of Courtyard Santa Ana. We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you back here soon.  Safe travels!

Summary: Spent 2 nights here. Rooms were spacious, clean and well laid out. Staff friendly and helpful. Bistro and coffee shop inside selling Starbucks. Free wifi, $9 per night for parking. Stored our bags here after check out. Would recommend to others and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear MumDadAnd3Kids,  We're so happy to hear that the Courtyard Santa Ana/ Orange County met all of your travel needs!  We thank you for taking the time to recommend our hotel to other travelers and hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel over the past month and have come to enjoy the hotel restaurant.  I recently ordered a Cobb salad which was great and asked if a hard boiled egg was an option. Venessa the server said that eggs were only available for breakfast. The next night I asked for the Cobb salad and she had gone out of her way to have hard boiled eggs prepared during the day. What service!  I feel like I'm spoiled when I'm away from home. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Jim W,  Thank you for taking the time to review the Courtyard Santa Ana Orange County.  We are thrilled to hear that you have enjoyed your recent stays and especially the Bistro.  It will be our pleasure to let Venessa know that her service was recognized and appreciated!  We thank you for your business and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Easy,  very friendly, professional check in. Lobby was nice and spacious. My room was clean and spacious. Restaurant on-site was pleasant and convenient. It was very busy and the young lady running it worked very hard and efficiently. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear about your positive experience at the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana.  We have shared your comments with the team and they join me in thanking you for taking the time to write such a kind review.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This hotel was clean with stylish/modern decor, very nice. Although the bedding and pillows were nice, I found the bed too hard for me. Location was great for our trip, we were in town for local concerts this particular weekend. Very close to food and shops all around. This is hotel is not very far from favorite attractions such as Disneyland and the outlet mall. You will find a very nice bistro that serves Starbucks inside this hotel. Hotel offers free wifi. Everyone in this hotel were nice and courteous. One thing to note is that you will have to pay for parking at this hotel. We paid $9 a day for parking which was a bummer but overall I recommend this hotel and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Alana,  We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Courtyard Santa Ana.  Thank you for taking the time to inform your fellow TripAdvisor travelers about our location, Bistro, Wi-Fi and parking.  Your recommendation is truly appreciated and we look forward to having you stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Tremendous value in the heart of OC
Summary: You can not find a better value in the area for the location. If you are a Marriott or Starwood member with AAA you can secure the best prices. Weekday rates @ $80 were an incredible value. Several restaurants are walking distance across the street. Ample self parking has easy in/out access (no parking structures). A great access point to everything OC. (Note: Cafe does not provide room service.)
Manager Response: Dear shannon w,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel and inform other travelers of your experience.  We are so pleased you were able to take advantage of our special holiday discounts and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: If you are gold/platinum member, may think twice before booking
Summary: I am life time gold and multi year platinum member. I usually stay in Marriott Hotel, but once a while stay in courtyard or residence inn for cost or location. This hotel may renovated for its look, but it needs a good customer service retraining. As I booked for a Marriott Family Friend rate, I received the cold reception during the evening of Dec 18, 2016 around 6:30 PM. I have received no recognition of the reward member status, and when I asked the welcome package and other amenities for platinum member's benefits, I was turned down and told me to call the reward customer service to verify. The next day, I called reward customer service, and told that I still entitle to received the platinum benefits even I booked under Family Friend Rate. I am not pleased that this
Manager Response: Dear DGK65,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and provide this feedback regarding your recent stay.  As we continuously strive to provide exceptional service and a memorable hotel stay (especially for our valued Gold & Platinum Members), I am disappointed to learn we fell short of that goal during your time with us.  Please accept our sincere apologies for not meeting your - or our own - expectations.  We have shared your comments with the team in an effort to improve our service moving forward and I hope we will have an opportunity to better serve you the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: This hotel was clean and well organized. Food and eating location is available outside the reception desk in a nice area. It was perfect for mom & me (I was bringing mom back to the east coast after 40 years in CA). We arrived tired and wanted a good, satisfying meal. The room was clean and well supplied. We had a little trouble with the bathroom door automatically closing (not so good with a walker) due to fire code. They don't offer shuttle to the airport on weekends, but they do pay for the taxi to get you there. I had dropped off the car the night before and they are supposed to come every 1/2 hour to pick up travelers at the airport, but I needed to call them to get a ride. (they weren't expecting me to be there.) They came in 5 minutes. Overall I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: The2Vacationers,  Thank you so much for your kind review. We appreciate the details! The staff at Courtyard Santa Ana are very happy to hear our hotel was a great option for your recent trip to the area. We understand how traveling can be tiring at times so it is wonderful to know we were able to provide you and your mom with comfortable accommodations. We hope to be your hotel choice the next time you are in town.

Summary: We really had a great time at this hotel.   I was impressed with the size of the 1 bedroom suite. Lots of space!  It's a great pick for family trips. Hotel service was good.  The grounds, pool, and spa were clean and easy to access. Local quick bites are close, literally across the street there was your choice of Indian, Mexican, Japanese foods and of course you're local Starbucks. This hotel is in a great location. Close to one of the best malls in California, Newport Center.  Also South Coast Mall is even closer.  Only 15 minutes away are the big theme parks. If you plan on flying in, John Wayne Airport is 10 minutes away from this place.  Very easy freeway access. There was no traffic or airplane noise. Check out is always easy at any Marriott property.  We will definitely be
Manager Response: Brent D,  What a thorough review of the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana! We appreciate your time in providing us with details of what you enjoyed most about staying with us. It is great to hear our location as well as the King Suite room worked well for you and your family. The best part of your feedback is hearing that you will be coming back. We look forward to being your hotel choice again soon.

Summary: Although the hotel was in a convenient location, the hotel staff was extremely rude. From the front desk to the parking assistants, no one appeared interested in helping at all. Very disappointing, since I am used to excellent service offered by Marriott properties.
Manager Response: oe46m3o,  Thank you for taking the time to send us your feedback. We are extremely sorry to hear that your experience with us was not a positive one. Please accept our apologies as it sounds like we were unable to follow through on our commitment to provide our guests with outstanding service. We will definitely follow up with our staff to ensure our service remains consistent and up to standards.

Summary: This is the hotel that really began my love affair with Marriott. It was a great hotel I could stay at while I was taking weekend MBA classes at UC Irvine. It was close to campus which I loved and the price was right! The service was wonderful!! While they don't have a restaurant per se, I was still able to get snacks and order food and drink from the bistro to take up to my room or eat in the lounge. I love the shrimp potstickers and the tomato mozzarella flatbread. Across the way are other restaurants so you have eating options! Rooms are clean, spacious, comfortable and quiet. And the wifi is fast!  I would end up coming late on Friday nights and leave Saturday mornings so I appreciated the easy in/out access - parking (both valet and self-park are great) and checkin/out. I
Manager Response: Sue D,  We can't thank you enough for your review. Your honest feedback and comments are much appreciated. We know you have many hotel options so we definitely appreciate you choosing the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana. We are thrilled to hear our property was a good fit for you while attending UCI. We hope to continue to be your hotel choice whenever you happen to be in the area.

Summary: Pretty standard Courtyard property a few miles down the road from John Wayne Orange County Airport (SNA). Some nearby dining options - a few quick service joints across the street, but you'll want to drive for better options in Santa Ana, Irvine, Newport Beach, etc.  The rooms are standard fare for a CY and in good shape. The hotel itself feels pretty new. The lobby has the dining area with breakfast and evening small bite options + beer/wine. I highly recommend the egg white frittata and the oatmeal. The lounge area toward the back is large and comfortable, with a variety of seating options. Note that, as with all CY properties, Marriott elites of any level do NOT receive free breakfast benefits - it doesn't matter if your Silver, Gold, Platinum, or Unobtanium (not a real
Manager Response: MrConsultant,  Thank you so much for choosing Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana while traveling to the Orange County area. We appreciate your thorough review and taking the time to let us know about your experience. We are glad to hear you found us to be consistent and that you would stay with us again. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We were not able to check into our rooms early so we spent two hours at the local mall…which happened to be South Coast Plaza, eek! (beautiful and expensive). The check in then went smoothly and our room was clean. The room seemed tucked away from the heat outside: It had the feel of a sanctuary (inner court window view). If I were alone on business travel in the Irvine area this would be a comfortable place to stay. The a/c unit was great. I thought the bathroom was excellent but the wardrobe was too small for hanging clothes and I"m not sure what it was about the queen beds--maybe the too fluffy pillows?--but I didn't sleep well. I have to compliment the staff at the downstairs cafe: What engaging, helpful personalities! After a busy day out we twice picked up the bbq chicken
Manager Response: 2MarineMom,  Thank you so much for your kind and honest review! The staff at Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana really appreciate your time in letting us know about your experience. It is great to hear you were able to dine with us and relax in our Bistro/ Lobby area. We hope to be your hotel choice the next time you are in the area.

Summary: stayed in Courtyard Santa Ana Orange County for one night in last June, it was nice, the hotel is in good location, room is clean and in good size, they have parking space and the staff was very nice.
Manager Response: moshe L,  Your kind words are much appreciated. It is great to hear our location worked well for you, and you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you will choose to stay with us again the next time you are in the Orange County area.

Summary: Our family stayed in the hotel for seven nights we were surprised by the absence of breakfast for platinum Marriott elite status the hotel is nice and staff is friendly but no free coffee the room was big and the hotel charge for parking the plus was the coin operated laundry
Manager Response: walidhassoun,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana. We appreciate you taking the time to send us a review. Your comments will be shared with the rest of our staff so we can continue to provide our guests with friendly service.

Summary Heading: A Platinum Elite Experience with Manager Carol Nasr
Summary: I am a multi year Platinum Elite guest who is perhaps the biggest flag-waving Marriott fan around.  I have had so many positive experiences with Marriott that this experience shocked me.  This is the first time in over 500 stays that I have complained.  I booked two nights at this property in one week - one on Sunday and one on Wednesday.  Monday and Tuesday I had to stay in San Diego at a different Marriott property.  At the last minute I learned that I would have to leave my car at this hotel.   No problem, I thought, it's paid parking , so I'll just settle up at the desk right now.  The desk clerk coldly told me it was not allowed if I was not a guest (of course I was for two nights the same week!)  After pleading with her, she went in back to ask Carol Nasr (the desk

Summary: A typical courtyard in a nice location.  Lots of dining options within walking distance.  Very close to John Wayne airport and they offer a shuttle.  Have stayed there on many occasions and have had no issues.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: jacobe64,  It is great to hear you will stay with us again! We are glad to hear our location worked well during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: What a great hotel! Our room was very clean and comfortable. While my husband worked on business, my two teen boys and I enjoyed the sparkling pool and went across the street for lunch. There are several sandwich and salad shops and a Starbucks conveniently located right across the street. The bistro is located in the lobby and we had a tasty burger on our last night! The guest laundry is located right next to the pool and gym so it was easy to do a load of laundry while we were by the pool. The hotel staff was very friendly and always available. I must mention a particularly kind and gracious member of your staff, Vanessa who works in the bistro. On our last night I had terrible back spasms and she was so very sweet. She gave me some stretching tips and even went out to her car
Manager Response: Psalmnine1,  Thank you very much for taking the time to let us know how your stay was, we appreciate you recognizing our team members who went above and beyond. It is great to hear we were able to exceed your expectations. We value your feedback and your business, and we hope to be your hotel choice the next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: What you expect from a Courtyard Marriott
Summary: Pros:  1)Freeway access to the 55 2)Starbucks across the street as well as eateries 3)Nice Lobby  Cons: 1)$9 for parking  2)"Valet Parking" is $11,  Nobody was around getting in late from disneyland.    Over flow parking goes to a structure thats charges $8(someone explain this to me)  S/C/V  and Review   Security:  Late night access to the main Lobby Door is by Key Card access. Emergency exits are clearly marked.  Pool is gated also  Cleanliness: Room was clean, Towels are softish and Shower(water cabinet) was clean. Fold out sofa bed could use a steam clean though.  Value: There are 3 hotels nearby all priced higher. For the rate it was offered was good, but a highly unnecessary parking rate made my budget higher than id like. Manager Response: Jesus C,  First of all, we want to thank you for choosing to stay with us. Summary: Visited southern Los Angeles and stayed in Marriott Courtyard in Santa Ana. Great find. Great location off Interstate and easy to get to many locations in and around LA. Located in a corporate part of Santa Ana that seemed new and vibrant. Hotel was well kept and very clean. Very nice front desk people. Stayed for 4 nights. Don't let valet parking bother you. Costs $2 extra (above $9 parking charge) and they are very quick getting your car. Would stay here again!!
Manager Response: Immersion15,  Thank you for your detailed review of the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana. Summary Heading: Could Do Without a Parking Charge
Summary: The hotel is well kept and the staff were helpful.  However, there is an additional parking charge at this location.  This hotel is not next to an airport and there is no need to charge for parking.  If Courtyard needs to regulate the lot, they can do it with a key entry rather than a charge.
Manager Response: BH2O,  The staff at Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana would like to thank you for your business, and for letting us know about your experience. We appreciate your time in sending us feedback, as our guests' opinions are valuable to us and our goal is to ensure our guests have an enjoyable visit while staying with us. Aside from parking, we hope your stay was problem free. Thank you for mentioning the helpfulness of our staff members, and it is great to hear you were happy with the upkeep of our hotel. We hope to have another opportunity to accomodate you in the future.

Summary: Close to the Orange County Airport with clean, modern rooms and comfortable beds while close to great dining and shopping.  Friendly staff gets you checked in quickly so you can get out to the pool or walk across the street to The Little Onion Mexican restaurant for a delicious strawberry margarita.  Close by to world class shopping at South Coast Plaza or Newport Fashion Island.  Just a few minute drive down to the ocean in Newport or Huntington Beach for a walk on the pier.  This Courtyard by Marriott lets you recharge your batteries with loved ones while looking after you for the duration of your stay.
Manager Response: Denver80203,  We appreciate you taking the time to send us such a kind review! It is great to hear your were able to recharge and enjoy all that the local area has to offer. Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Things started off perfect, and stayed that way. I was able to check in early. The young lady at the front desk (Jasmine, I think), was doing a great job. She had four people in front of me, and at least three more behind me. She handled each person quickly, and professionally. It was kind of funny, I had a bad experience at a different hotel the night before, and I just wanted a peaceful place for the next two nights. There was a girls soccer team checking in, and I quietly said, "this is embarrassing, but can I get a room away from all of these children"? She laughed, and made sure I was taken care of.  My room was clean. The bed was comfortable. Pillows were great. And, the peace and quiet was perfect.  The Bistro was very convenient. It was nice to be able to enjoy a

Summary: Clean but basic accomodation near Irvine. Front desk service at night couldn't manage to deliver linens without screwing up - by writing down the wrong room number and then telling me I'd have to pick them up myself. Kinda lame considering they should have been on the sofa bed to start with.

Summary: we enjoyed our three nights stay at this Courtyard. The staff was friendly. It has a bistro inside the hotel for light food, beer, coffee , small gym, and across the street is Starbucks and few other eatery.  Self parking is $9.00, valet is $11. Room is clean, coffee station, small fridge, free wifi. We would coming back again.

Summary: Our flight got cancelled due to bad weather in Denver and we had to stay at the Courtyard motel near the airport.The hotel had rooms that were good.We spent a lot of time in their lobby and restaurant.They need to have more items on the dinner menu.

Summary: loved the firepits and new restaurant and menu.  The pool is awesome and great for families and has a wonderful rec center. Pleasantly surprised, We will be returning. seems very high end. The only down side is parking.

We are glad you and your family enjoyed your visit, and we look forward to being your hotel choice the next time you are in town.

Summary: Very clean, quiet area. Ideal for structured stays.  I had little difficulty locating the property and was greeted with a well-prepared staff.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  Wi-Fi easy to access.

Manager Response: Jholdas,   We appreciate you choosing to stay at the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana during your recent visit to the Orange County area. We value your feedback as it gives us the opportunity to improve the service we provide our guests. The staff here at Courtyard Santa Ana pride ourselves in making sure our guests have an enjoyable stay. We are truly thankful to hear of your experience and glad that you felt right at home! Please come visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel if you need to be close to John Wayne airport
Summary: priced right, and located close to the airport (fortunately... not in the flight line for incoming planes).  clean rooms, parking $ but reasonable for the area. all modern interiors and renovated lobby.
Manager Response: johnbtourist,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay with us at the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana.
