The staff at Courtyard Santa Ana take pride in he cleanliness and upkeep of our rooms, as well as the service we provide our guests. We look forward to accomodating you again the next time you fly out of the John Wayne airport.

Summary: I don't often stay at Marriott Courtyard products, not for any particular reason, I just don't.  But due to my "normal" hotel not being available I stayed here and it was exceptional.  The last time I stayed at a Courtyard was 3 years ago in Santa Barbara, I thought I was having deja vu.  It's nice to see their updated, consistent, professional look.  It's comfortable, large guest rooms, wifi worked very well, staff was friendly.  Good place to conduct business meetings as it wasn't noisy with kids running everywhere.  The breakfast bar had plenty of options to select from with both hot and cold items. Hotel is easily accessible from the highway, plenty of parking and things within walking distance.
Manager Response: ScreenName911,  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to accomodate you during your trip to Orange County. We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and give us feedback on your experience at the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana. We definitely see the importance of consistency and it is something our staff is always striving for. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you the next time you are in town!

Summary: Comfortable and clean.  Friendly staff.  No charge for parking your car!  It is irritating to be charged for a car that you HAVE to have in SOCA.  Great restaurants nearby and shopping.   Its our go to for our trips to CA.
Manager Response: Nancycmeyers,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and also for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. At the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana, our priorty is to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay. We are glad to hear that you found our location to be convenient and accomodating for your trips to the area. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We booked rooms 221 and 222 at this hotel for $88.°° each plus $9.°° parking our staying was very good better that the one in Costa Mesa we got 2 queen beds in each room in Costa Mesa we got 1 queen bed and a sofa, in the future we will stay at this hotel if there is space, the hotel is very clean and quite is 15min. driving to Disney land parks on Highway 55 to highway 5 north very easy drving access.
Manager Response: RLNA M,  Thank you so much for your kind review of the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana, and for even providing photos! We are delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us, but we are even more thrilled to hear you will be returning. The staff at Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana really value the feedback our guests provide as it gives us an opportunity to improve and better accomodate you. We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Booked here because of an early flight out of John Wayne the next morning.  Perfect location within an easy 5 minute drive to airport.  Very nice rooms and very nice staff.  Might want to ask for a courtyard view as the other side is next to a busy street.  Did not bother me but might bother a light sleeper.  Didn't like the $9 parking charge.  First time ever for a Courtyard by Marriott.  Free wifi was a plus.  Very nice informal restaurant in lobby.  Good things because there is not much choices in places to eat nearby.  Would stay again for an airport stopover.
Manager Response: John J,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana for your trip out of Orange County. We appreciate your kind comments. I will make sure to share your review with all of our staff. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our onsite restaurant, The Bistro. Hopefully next time you are in town, you will come back to try our seasonal menu items!

Summary: Kyle was great in helping us check in at the front. He was very helpful and we really appreciate it. It was at a great location near Newport Beach so it allows us the convenience to drive at our desired destination. We got the suite and was spacious like usual. The only thing is that above the roof there was some weird crackly noise. Although we address the issue to the front desk.. It was still a mystery lol. I'm guessing the tree branch or something is causing that noise. I do wished the bathroom could of been remodeled. The toilet was kind of loud when flushed.   Overall, our stay was better than ok. Thumbs up to Kyle, the housekeeper or front desk didn't bother us if we needed to checkout late.. So that was peaceful!  The location is awesome .. But it could use a little
Manager Response: Aldo K, Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana. I am glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us, and found our location to be convenient. At the Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana, our priority is to ensure that our guests have an enjoyable stay so thank you for providing us with your feedback. We hope you will visit again soon!

Summary Heading: Property can't overcome rudeness of staff
Summary: This is a nice Courtyard property with a feel that is more upscale than most. there are a couple of good restaurants in walking distance as well. None of this makes up for how rudely I was treated by the staff. I am a platinum elite member, but every customer deserves to be treated respectfully. I will avoid this property in the future.
Manager Response: TimB1969, Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback of your stay. I am sorry to hear that your experience with us was not up to standards. I understand how upsetting it is to feel like you were not treated the way should have been. Please accept my apologies as we certainly value our guests and recognize our loyal Elite Members, so we want to correct any deficiencies that prevent our guests from returning. I will make sure to share your feedback with our team. We hope you will give us another chance to accomodate you again in the future.

Summary: I used to stay at this Courtyard a lot, but then the rates became more and more expensive and so I switched to the Holiday Inn in Santa Ana.  For whatever reason, the rate on this hotel was in line so I stayed again.  It is a very nice hotel.  It is clean, updated, and quiet.  I love that you can walk right across the street to restaurants if you don't want to eat in the hotel and I also like that there is a Starbuck's in the lobby.  It is a straight shot from the airport. So, why wouldn't I give this a 5?  First of all, the rates are generally too high.  Although the Holiday Inn isn't next to restaurants that you can walk to and there isn't a Starbuck's in the lobby, and it isn't as updated, it is still hard to justify the additional expense.  But the thing that completely is
Manager Response: 2CKGkids, We appreciate your review and are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! It is great to hear you were able to take advantage of our convenient location. Much like other hotels, our rates do fluctuate on a daily basis depending on our occupancy. We thank you for your loyalty to Courtyard Marriott Santa Ana, and hopefully we will be able to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: I'd give a ZERO if I could!
Summary: Booked this hotel and received an email confirmation with a $119 rate.  Realized we only needed one night so I called to modify, I was assured that the rate was still the same!  Flash forward a week and I get a email confirmation that the rate jumped $40!  I called Lindsey (manager) and she would NOT adjust the rate!  Most of our team cancelled and the families that didn't ALL got different rates!  On top of that!  There was NO parking!  Go to the Irvine Marriott, they are polite and the hotel is WAY better!!
Manager Response: AHanes87, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and your recent stay with us. We certainly value your patronage and your feedback. I understand how frustrating it is to have last minute changes to your travel plans, so I want to apologize as it sounds like there was some miscommunication, and you were not properly informed of the contract terms for your group reservation. I will make sure to share your thoughts with our team to ensure we have a more thorough communication process in place.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to accomodate you and your family the next time you are in the area.

Summary: I'm a very loyal Marriott Elite member, and I've stayed at my fair share of Courtyards through the years, since they seem to be the most consistent of the Marriott lines. I generally know what to expect: Above average rooms, clean bathrooms, and no free breakfast (which seems to bother some other people). The pool looked nice, the workout room was decent, and the property generally looked to be well-maintained. There appeared to be only one elevator for the entire property, though (consistent with other Courtyards) and boy is it slow. Be ready for that. Otherwise, I'd highly recommend this hotel.  My only gripe with this property (and it was a fairly big annoyance at the time) is that parking is somewhat of an issue at this property. The hotel appeared to only offer valet
Manager Response: Hi Peter F,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Stayed here for a quick stay over in Costa Mesa.  Staff at check in were great.  Hotel is consistent for a Courtyard - clean and comfortable rooms and average fitness center.  With Courtyard you know what you are getting.....no surprises, just a consistently good experience.  Hotel is perfectly situated and very close to John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Property hardly smoke-free and no one cared.
Summary: Where do I start? The staff is friendly, welcoming and the rooms are a great value. They have a comfortable bed, appear to be good for a family and there are nice, smoke-free property signs throughout the premises.   Unfortunately, the joy ended for us a few hours ago when we awoke to the pungent skunk smell of marijuana that permeated throughout our room and the hallways. The neighboring room was also partying and being obnoxious.  I am a huge Marriott fan and this was nothing compared to our stay at Residence Inn about 20 miles away the next evening or any of my other Marriott visits.   I probably would not have made such a *stink* (pun fully intended), but the sad part is the first room we were put in actually smelled like cigarettes covered in febreeze. We requested a switch
Manager Response: Dear Nathaniel V,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am truly sorry to hear that you experienced the smell of smoke during your visit. Please be assured that our hotel does not allow for smoking. I will meet with our entire team to ensure that we continue enforcing our policy against smoking.  Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back when your travels bring you back to Orange County,

Summary Heading: Attractive Property. Friendly Staff. Clean, Comfortable Rooms. Reasonable Room Rates.
Summary: This is a nice property conveniently located in-town. Good security, attractive public areas. Clean & modern guest rooms. Comfortable beds. There is a charge for parking, but when added to the room cost, the overall nightly cost is still reasonable. The bathroom in my guest room had a shower-only stall. Although very attractive, the design of the shower stall allows water to splash onto the bathroom floor, causing a slip hazard. Other than that minor annoyance, I had an enjoyable stay and will visit again the next time I am in Santa Ana.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriot Santa Ana/Orange County!  We are happy to hear that you were pleased with your stay and I will be sure to pass your compliments on to the entire staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back when your travels bring you back to Orange County.

Summary: Been doing some regular business trips to OC recently and sampled various hotels in proximity to Santa Ana. I give Courtyard overall the thumbs up! The location is convenient to central Santa Ana (15-20 minutes via surface streets in morning rush) and also similarly convenient to the airport, and other office areas neaby (Costa Mesa, west part of Irvine, Newport Beach around the airoprt).  The facilities and rooms are attractive, clean, comfortable,and quiet. Nothing fancy, mind you, but well done. Nice spacious lounge, and a "bistro" that offers quick fare better than average.  I plan on using The Courtyard again.  Only glitch: had trouble getting wifi connection to work in room, but fortunately didn't need it. Worked for phone, but not computer? There are, however, computer
Manager Response: Hi Meg G,  Thank you for your review!  We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your stay and will plan on returning when business brings you back to the Oramge County area.

Summary: Very pleasant stay, nice comfortable room, easy parking, Starbucks across the street. Friendly staff. Modern, good location. Comfy beds. We are used to staying in 5 star hotels and we are very picky and we were very pleased with this property.
Manager Response: Hi Michelle S,  Thank you for taking the tme to review the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana!  I am so glad to hear that you were pleased with your stay and we hope to welcome you back the next time your travels bring you to the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: Nice and new, close to airport
Summary: Nothing bad to say, all good except not much noise insulation between rooms. Clean and fresh, what you would expect from a newer Courtyard. Good shuttle service to airport, friendly and accommodating staff. Across the street from restaurants, fast food, etc. Well equipped fitness center and outdoor pool/spa. In industrial section not much to walk and see.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel!  We are happy to hear that you were pleased with your stay and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights February 20-22, 2015.  Everything was as we expected.  Check in went as planned and we received our room key in short order.  Room very nice,  Bathroom roomy and shower good.  Complimentary breakfast not included, but the bistro on property served very good breakfasts and reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana!  We are pleased to hear that you had a good stay and look forward to welcoming you back when your travels bring you back to the Orange County area.

Summary: We were a group of 2 couples staying here the night before our cruise with Carnival left from Long Beach port.  It was located approx 25 mins from the cruise port and had much better rates than the hotels in Long Beach.  The rooms were average in size but clean and comfortable for our 1 night stay.    We had a drink and some food in the restaurant/bar downstairs in the Lobby in the evening and again for Breakfast in the morning.  The food was good and they offer Starbucks coffee.  The service there was what stood out, the woman behind the bar was excellent, very friendly and helpful about the area and getting to the cruise port.  She absolutely made this hotel special, and was there late in the evening and first thing in the morning too (I think she may have been the one running
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana!  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will be sure to pass on your compliments to our Bistro team.  I hope you have a wonderful cruise!

Summary: Close to the airport, nice rooms, decent gym.  I'd stay there again.  They were good about dropping me off at my meeting.  They also have a decent restaurant for breakfast.  tiny bar in the hotel lobby, and a small gym too.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County while you were in the area for a meeting.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: If you're a business traveler, and you're not looking for dinner at your hotel, but you are looking for clean, modern, wifi, comfortable, decent gym and breakfast, bingo .. All at a very reasonable price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana!  We are thrilled to hear that you found our hotel to be "business perfect" and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: Great hotel for business travel, convenient, marketplace offers, salads, sandwiches, pizza, wine and beer.    Located near John Wayne Airport.  Nice customer service! Friendly, helpful staff all around.  Easy to access Wifi, clean comfortable rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County.  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and I will be sure to pass along your compliments to the entire team.  We look forward to see you when your travels bring you back to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Does a great job at what it is designed to do
Summary: It is a very standard Courtyard by Marriott that has been remodeled to the newer style. The things that make it 5 star is that the location is great and the service was great. It is not a 5 star hotel, but it gets 5 stars for doing a great job of doing what it is designed to do. Probably my only complaint is the charge for parking, but I figure that has to go with the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our team takes a lot of pride in providing good service and what a great compliment to be given a 5 for service,  Thank you and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: I stayed at the Courtyard Marriott near SNA airport.  The hotel was clean (spotless) and the bedroom was spacious, but I expected more for $139/night.  No breakfast included in the rate, and no coffee in the lobby.  The only coffee served was Starbucks, and I'm not a fan of that brand.  Staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank your for your recent stay!  I am happy to hear that you were pleased with staff and cleanliness of the hotel and I will be sure to pass the compliments onto the rest of the team.  We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: well to start of i have stayed at this hotel numerous times. I stay at this hotel every 2 weeks. As i travel from Sacramento ( 6 hr drive) to La area. I was very impressed every time accept ( the noise of kids and $9 self parking) despite all that my stay has always been pleasant due to friendly staff and they let you check in earlier then 3pm. I loved that part. now being a regualr customer and taking my business to them when theres plenty of hotels to choose from by john wayne airport. my last visit was horrible. I was placed on 3rd floor and I had to call front desk twice that night due to heavay noise and stomping coming from 4th floor. after calling twice the noise kept going. after not getting good rest and i had to head back to sacramento on sunday i called front desk to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I understand how frustrating it can be to have a long drive ahead of you and not be able to have a late check out to get more rest. We are happy to offer extended check out times to our guests when we have the availabilty and I truly apologize that we weren't able to accommodate your request this time.  Thank you again and we hope that you will choose us again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County area.

Summary: I stayed here for a week on business. Our new office is very close and I'll be in the area twice per month from now on.  The hotel was very typical of other courtyard hotels that I've stayed at, except that the staff was better than average.  The area is a little noisy and the televisions are smaller then I typically see in hotels these days , but overall I'd say that I had a nice stay.  Unfortunately, it's not a good value. As a courtyard there is no free breakfast, and as others have mentioned parking isn't free, either. I'm a top tier Marriott Rewards number so I'll probably come back but I may look at other properties as well.  If TripAdvisor supported half stars, I'd give 3.5.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel.  I will be sure to pass your compliments regarding our staff to the rest of the hotel. While we do have a parking fee, please keep in mind that we offer complimentary shuttle service to and from John Wayne/Orange County airport.  We hope to see you again when you return to Orange County.

Summary: I booked this due to very high reviews.   I did not like this place!! 30 screaming sports kids and adults in lobby.. they're huge on football here.  Bring your earplugs if you don't like noise, though I must say somehow I slept through the night. I didn't notice they charge for parking before booking -- 9 bucks.   Room was meh.  Had a weird odor.  Beware - Turned on heat and weird smell came out, so kept off. Gym was dreary and elliptical machine not too good.   Let's just say - wouldn't return!
Manager Response: Dear Lexi1980,   Thank you for your review and for letting us know how your stay was. I understand how frustrating it can be when you find noise to be a concern. I am sorry to hear that you were not able enjoy your stay. As you mentioned, we typically receive high reviews and our team does a great job so we certainly appreciate that you took the time to inform us when we have fallen short of providing the best customer service. I will make sure to follow up with our team to ensure that  future stays at our hotel are more up to our guests' standards.

Summary Heading: Very nice stay and great location for SNA
Summary: Easy to get to the airport and from the valet parking attendant to the front desk and check in, the service is very pleasant.  The rooms are very clean, well appointed with comfy beds and quiet with good HVAC systems.  Surprisingly, the little cafe in the lobby is very good and if Charlie is on, enjoy his graciousness and humor!  We have not enjoyed a waiter more!  He was willing to accommodate just what we wanted and he is joyful and pleasant.  Thank you for great staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County!  We are so happy to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us. I will be sure to pass your compliments to Charlie. He definitely takes pride in taking care of our guests and he will be thrilled to hear he was able to make your stay even better.  We hope to see you again in the near future when you are back in the Orange County area.

Summary: Good hotel, stayed there a couple of days with the family to go to Disneyland.  Great service from front desk and friendly staff. I would stay there again.  The only drawback is the $12 parking fee.  It is close to other dining and entertainment options.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel!   We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and I will be sure to pass your compliments to the rest of the staff.  We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: The hotel is a good location for SNA airport and Newport Beach. It was clean and the starbucks in the lobby is good. I was on the 3rd floor and the street noise was loud enough that I needed ear plugs in the morning to fall back to sleep. I would not book the hotel again because of the noise.
Manager Response: Dear Kay71163,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience.  Every process put in place is aimed at providing you with an unforgettable hotel experience. From your recent feedback, I am disappointed to learn that we fell short of your expectations.   I would like to take this time to apologize for the noise disturbance caused by the outside noise. Rest assured, we are taking steps to help ensure problems of this nature do not occur in the future.

Summary: First let me start by saying I did not catch the fee for parking when I booked this hotel and that is my fault. I never book hotels that charge you to park on the lot of the very hotel you have booked a room at. why should I have to pay to park a car?? fee was $9 to park myself or $12 valetThe hotel is new and looks nice.. The rooms have a strange layout, the bed faces the window and the desk and T.V. are against the wall to your left (in our room) so when you are laying in bed you have to turn to you left to see the t.v. The wall between the bathrooms must be hollow because I could clearly hear my neighbor urinating while I was brushing my teeth! the shower door is a poor design and does not seal well. had a large puddle of water on floor after shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  I am so sorry that you weren't aware of the parking charges prior to arriving. Please know that we do offer complimentary shuttle service to and from John Wayne/Orange County Airport if you are flying into the Orange County area.  Hopefully we will have a chance to welcome you back to the hotel when your travels bring you back into our area.  Thanks!

Summary: This hotel is very clean and nice.  Beds are comfortable, and decor up to date and well maintained.  We stayed here on our last night before an early flight and the shuttle was very convenient.  I didn't have any problem with noise.  Kids enjoyed the pool area.  Overall, we had a good experience.  Our only request is to have coffee available to early morning travelers.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County!  We are happy to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of some of the amenities that we offer.  Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back when you are in the Orange County area!

Summary: Staff was nice and friendly. They had good channels. They make you pay for parking?!?! What the? We stayed there for 3 days so we had to pay 3 days worth if parking without us being told we had to pay. I had tons if luggage and no one offered to help. Under the pullout bed there was a ash mark from a cigarette under it. Very noisy. Overprices for what you could get out of a hotel. Worst of the Marriott chain. It was so bad I slept with my parents at the skyline Essex apartment where they live.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I am happy to hear that you found the staff to be friendly, however I apoplogize that you had to find aother arrangments in order to sleep due to noise.   Hopefully we will have the opportunity to accommodate you in the future when you are in the area visiting family. Please feel free to contact us prior to your arrival and we will ensure that you are checked in to a room that better meets your needs.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great Property When in Town for Business
Summary: I've stayed at this property a couple of times when in town on business.  Reception is always swift and convenient.  Parking is adjacent (although spaces are full at night).  There are a couple of ethnic dining choices in the adjacent strip mall and the general area is good for a walk which isn't always the case in greater LA/Orange County.  This is an upgraded/newer Courtyard property with nice rooms, quiet, clean and modern.  The lobby area is lounge like with food and beverage service (albeit a bit slow at times).  Also, convenient location just off I-55 and not far from the other freeways.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County!  We are very happy to hear that you were pleased with your stay and that you were able to takeadvantage of some of the amenities as well as the food court across the street.  We look forward to seeing you when you are back in the Orange County area.

Summary: We spent four nights in this Hotel located on MacArthur Blvd.  First of all let me say that the employees made everyone feel welcome and special.. When a problem arose we called it to the attention of the front desk and it was fixed.  that is with the exception of our shower not having the trim on the door and fooding our bathroom and the girl at the front desk did not alert maintenance to have it fixed.  The maid service was excellent and they responded with action at our request. This Hotel could use upgrades in noise control as being on a very busy street it stayed noisy up into the night from our room 235.  Maybe it was quieter on the other side of the Hotel.  I still cannot understand why the price of $150 per night does not include breakfast with Marriott.  We stayed here
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay!  I will be sure to pass along your compliments to the entire staff.  We hope to see you back again when your travels take you to Orange County.

Summary: Not enough parking spaces for the hotel. Pay to park your own car. Slowest elevators ever.  Next to a busy street and walls are thin. Probably not a good hotel for light sleepers.   Hotel staff was nice. Good cable TV selection.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  While we are happy to hear that you were pleased with the service at the hotel, I would like to apologize that you found parking to be scarce during your visit with us. I will be sharing your comments with the parking attendants to ensure that they are communicating the parking options that are available to our guests to avoid any future difficulties with finding open spaces.  Thank you again for your feedback as it only helps us to improve.  We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: This our 1st choice when we can't stay at Newport Beach. Very close to highway, shopping, and restaurants.  Very very clean rooms! I'm very picky about where I stay and value opinions on here so trust me when I say this is a good place for the price!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County!  We are so glad to hear that we are your hotel of choice when you are in the area. I will be sure to pass your compiments on to the rest of the team.  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Stayed at this property for yet another youth softball tournament.  The property itself was very nice, however, the staff was just "ok".  At check-in, strangely, none of our credit cards would work.  When I called Visa, they advised me that they did not received any authorization requests...Eventually, the hotel found a way to get them to go through.  The rooms were very nice and roomy, however, more than once our room had not been tended to before 3PM...  The "smoking area" outside in the front of the property was very nice to sit by (even being a non-smoker) as the morning weather in Southern Cal is wonderful, however, there were constantly cigarette butts on the ground from the night before...  This property DID offer breakfast to players and families in a private room,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the hotel overall, we are dissapointed that you were not given the level of service that you deserved.  I would like to apologize on behalf of the entire hotel staff and thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I will be sharing your comments with the team.  Again, thank you for taking the time to give us feedback as this only helps us improve.

Summary: I live a block away from this hotel.  My home was being fumigated so I chose this location to stay while out of my house.  I drive by every day and have always assumed that it is a "high end" hotel because of how it looks.  I was able to get a great Last minute deal Plus a AAA discount which brought the price well below their standard rates.  The property is nestled between office buildings, 2 high rise condos and a strip mall with Starbucks and small restaurants.  The decor is modern and clean.  The lobby is wide open with chairs, stools and couches to relax or enjoy some food and drinks from "The Bistro".  "The Bistro" has morning and evening hours but I was unable to partake because of my schedule.  I believe their hours were 7am-11am and 5:00pm-10:00pm.  The standard king
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us while your home was getting fumigated.
