Summary: Stayed here for a soccer tournament. Completely met all expectations. Rooms are clean, beds are comfy and staff was friendly. Only complaint is that our team was offered our continental breakfast an hour early to accommodate early soccer game and it was not ready as promised. Luckily, there was a Starbucks across the street and we were able to get to the game on time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County!  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: We needed a hotel close to the airport due to a very early flight and this one was perfect.  Great rooms, very clean, friendly staff, a few restaurants within walking distance and Starbucks across the street.  Also nice restaurant/bar in the hotel.  5 minute very easy drive to John Wayne airport.  I would not recommend this as a vacation hotel, ( location and very small pool) but it was a really great airport hotel and an excellent value,  Highly recommended for travelers needing accommodations close to the airport
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County!  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please keep in mind that we also provide complimentary shuttle service to and from John Wayne/Orange County Airport.   We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Not the Ritz but Clean & New
Summary: Clean, nice crisp rooms; very well maintained hotel; great location in relation to John Wayne Airport and a great value $$ wise......parking can be challenging and they try to force you to use their valet; just pull in and turn left into the parking lot and park; its a 15 yard walk to the front desk; I a bit of a hotel snob and I highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we are looking forward to seeing you again in the near future

Summary Heading: Clean room small lot - lots of door slamming!
Summary: We liked this hotel well enough, clean, nice room with good shampoo and soaps. But when we got back in at night there is not nearly enough parking! My advice: go with the valet, costs a couple bucks more but they line your car up in back.  Also there are early early risers here with loud slamming doors.  Always seems to be some high school sports team staying here. I probably wouldn't stay here again , but would recommend it way over staying in Los Angeles proper. In Irvine it's safe and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and we happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel overall.  We appreciate the feedback you provided regarding the noise that you heard from the other guestroom doors. I understand how frustrating it can be to hear the other doors closing loudly, especially early in the morning! We are pleased to announce that we have met to discuss your comments and our maintenance department has already begun making adjustments to each of the guestroom doors to ensure that they will close softer.  Thank you again and we hope to see you back again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, poor planning for sports teams
Summary: The hotel staff is great and the rooms are clean.   That said, I have several complaints about my experience, particularly, the "Sports Team Breakfast."  *One container for coffee that was constantly empty because there were so many people.  *Hours were 6-8 but what about the people who had late games? It should have been available until 9 at least, especially when nothing is ready at 6.  *Warm milk, warm orange juice, burnt bacon, FRENCH FRIES and ketchup (did they run out of hashbrowns and just throw something together) watery oatmeal, etc.  *We had to constantly ask for plates and silverware.  *One large bowl of fruit that was never replenished.  I could go on and on...there are several softball and water polo teams staying here. After 8 years of traveling for a sport, this
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel overall, we would like to apologize that the team breakfast was not up to the standards that you experienced with the rest of the hotel amenities. I understand how frustrating it is to be on tight schedule only to find that the breakfast for your family is not adequate. Thanks to your feedback our team is reviewing our current policies, such as times of the team's breakfasts and items that we offer so that future sports teams will not encounter the same challenges. Thank you again for your feedback as it is always helps us improve to not only hear the positive aspects of your stay with us, but also know from our guest's prospective the items where we can improve.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in a great location
Summary: The hotel is very nice and clean. There was tea/coffee in the room.  The only thing missing was a safe which could have come in handy.  The staff were very nice and accommodating.  The location is great-very close to South Coast Plaza which is a huge mall with every store imaginable.  I would definitely stay here again,
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. While we do not have safes in the rooms, we do have safety deposit boxes available at the front desk for our guests to use, so please be sure to let us know on your next visit with us and we will be more than happy to accommodate. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Good hotel at a good price
Summary: Hotel was clean and the front desk people were friendly.  Had a room close to corner on the fourth floor facing the 55 freeway.  Did not hear any noise.  The fitness room was bigger than most hotels and had a variety of cardio machines and free weights.  Did not use the pool, though it seemed like there was always at least a couple of people using it.  The parking was fine.  Once, we had to use the adjacent parking structure, but it was right next to the hotel parking lot,so no big deal.  The location is ideal in that it is close by to a lot of hang out places and right off the freeway.  Ate breakfast at the hotel a couple of times.  The food was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We pretty much were here just to sleep (late check in & early checkout) but it was a nice room. Quick and easy to check in, our room was adequate, and the staff members were helpful and nice. It's a very well maintained hotel. Our room looked refreshing and not old and tired as some hotels do. I've been pleased by Marriott for keeping their hotels/rooms updated. Their beds were super comfortable! Slept like a baby that night!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a restful night with us. Hopefully you will have some extra time in the future to utilize some of the amenities here at the hotel. We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: After a delightful three night stay at the Courtyard by Marriott in Medford, OR in May we decided to give the Santa Ana property a try.  Normally we stay just down the street at the Doubletree Club in Santa Ana, which is almost twice as much per night with a hefty fee for WiFi.  I expected to love this hotel based on my Medford experience, and wanted to love it based on the room cost.  While overall our experience was good, there were a few minor but annoying issues.  First let me say the staff could not have been more pleasant.  We appreciated the effort of the front desk to give us an end corner room for peace and quiet in a hotel full of rowdy youth sport teams. The property was clean and the bed was very comfortable.  Now the cons.  Handicapped parking was blocked off by
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you experienced great customer service. I understand that you had some challenges with the shower. While our team does a great job at maintaining the hotel, there may be times when there may be an issue and we appreciate you calling it to our attention so that we can take care of it. Please keep in mind that we also offer some rooms with bathtubs if you prefer that on your next stay. We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: I had a 2 night stay at this hotel for my high school reunion. Very nice , clean hotel with good sized swimming pool .. Fairly new and spacious room with free wifi , convenient business center for IT related needs. The lobby area is nice with Starbux inside the hotel. Overall a positive experience despite this being a 3 star hotel. No wonder is is rated the top hotel in Santa Ana by TripAdvisor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here with us and we hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: There are a lot of hotels in the 55/MacArthur area in OC, and I almost passed on this Courtyard since it's so understated and tucked away. The rate I got was at least 30 bucks cheaper than everything else in the area, so I decided to give it a try. And it was great. New, clean, convenient to so much of Orange County but not in the landing pattern of the airport. Paying for parking at a Courtyard seems strange, but my total bill including parking was still unbelievable. This would be a great and affordable base for a beach or even Disney trip. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay. We are located in a great location within a short driving distance to Disneyland and local beaches. We hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Shockingly well designed comfortable clean and affordable.
Summary: What a brilliant surprise! Beautiful lobby, great rooms, terrific exercise center and across the street  from Starbucks.the staff is ready to assist with area attractions. The technology in the lobby is impressive. Along with free Wi-Fi. Tops most Marriotts for comfort and location. A winner!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to you staying with us again in the very near future.

Summary: Was in Santa Ana for a basketball tournament and the host hotel was embassy suites.  Words cannot express how happy I was to not have booked with them.  The best thing Embassy offered was the courtyard view.  The rooms were old school, unlike the Marriott Courtyard in Santa Ana. The hotel was immaculate, service was awesome, rooms very comfortable, cafes, Starbucks and other goodies only steps across the street.  Easy access to freeways, Newport beach and Southcoast mall.  And to top it off, my daughter played one of her best games ever. Can't wait for the next tournament in that area.  O
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that your daughter had a great tournament. We are looking forward to welcoming you and your team back when you are in the area.

Summary: The housekeeping staff sure impressed us.  I mentioned that we had 4 people in our room, and needed extra towels and supplies.  The staff member right away brought back 7 towels and 4 shampoos.  I categorize that as going the extra mile.  The room was not particularly impressive, except in terms of being very clean.  The front desk and parking staff were also very friendly & welcoming.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff always looks for ways to personalize our guest's stay and I will be sure to pass on your compliments. We hope to see you again in the very near future

Summary Heading: New Courtyard that charges for parking!
Summary: I have stayed at plenty of Marriott properties, including Courtyards, but never had been charged for valet parking (you have no choice - $11.00 per day).  Also, I was here on business, and other Courtyards usually include breakfast with the rate I book, but not this one.  When I went down to grab a quick muffin, only one person handling all the breakfast traffic - so I opted not to order anything to save time.  They need more help in the morning.  That said, the property is brand new, contemporary and immaculate.  The walls are rather thin - I could hear the woman next door on the phone.  Ask for a room away from Mac Arthur Blvd.  While it is not too busy at night, you do hear it during the day.  I asked for a quiet room and was assured it was - but it faced Mac Arthur Blvd.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay wtih us and taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you found your stay enjoyable and the hotel to be immaculate.  I will be sure to pass on your comments regarding the speed of service that you received during breakfast. While we strive for each guest to have a flawless stay, we appreciate the feedback when we have fallen short. Thank you again and we hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: This is one of the Best Courtyard in USA!
Summary: Stayed here to try out different Marriott options within the Irvine/Costa Mesa and this one is a perfect example of how Marriott should be like.  Location: close to freeway, business parks, John Wayne Airport (With drive or shuttle services) and South Coast Plaza.  Facilities: Brand new gym, great pools and friendly staff. Open bar in the lobby area where many people gather and socialize at night.  Rooms: Spacious, brand new rooms with all the latest technology features. Comfortable bed and AC. Excellent shower pressure and the bathroom is spotless.  Overall, an excellent value for those who needs to bank Marriott status.  The only thing that I did not like is the parking charges. I believe they should remove the charge since many other hotels nearby do not charge for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and I will be sure to pass on your compliments to the rest of the staff. We hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Excellent location good value for money.
Summary: We stayed here due to its proximity to John Wayne Airport and it did the job. Friendly staff  (nothing was too much trouble) spacious rooms and good value for money. The service in the bistro was excellent too. The pool looked nice but we didn't have time to use it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and review of our hotel! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Hopefully you will get a chance to relax by the pool on your next visit.  Thanks again and we are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This new hotel is everything a Courtyard should be! Absolutely spotless, a great pool, gym, and friendly, helpful staff. We stayed here on two different occasions in February 2013 and each visit was perfect. We always ask for top floor rooms, away from the elevator. We found that the interior side rooms (away from either road) were very quiet. We will definitely be back anytime we are in Orange County!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and review of our hotel!  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay. I will be sure to share your comments to the rest of the staff as we take great pride in providing a clean and inviting hotel. We look forward to your return in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Great location, Great hotel, Excellent Hospitality
Summary: We were looking for a hotel that was close to John Wayne Airport that would best suit the needs for a quiet night rest, and this hotel fit the bill.  The only surprise (and it wasn't a big surprise) was the fact that the hotel did have a parking fee for your vehicle.  The cost was minimal... I believe it was $8, and they also had a reasonable valet option as well.  The lobby was very modern and open.  They had an expansive area where you could find a chair and lounge/relax if you chose to.  They also had a coffee bar, although we didn't go to it so I cannot give you enough details if that is something that would sway your booking here.    The hotel was clean, as was the room.  We stayed on the 4th floor, in the room adjacent to MacArthur Blvd, and I can tell you that we didn't
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and compliments! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It sounds like you didn't have the opportunity to try our Bistro, be sure to stop by on your next visit and enjoy a Starbucks Latte. We look forward to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice...with the exception of super thin walls
Summary: You can save about $40 by staying at this Courtyard versus staying at a full fledged Marriott around the area. The renovated room is very nice...everything that you would find at a Marriott. In fact, the shower was better than the Marriott's shower. There is ample free parking in the rear of the hotel. Good location. It's very clean.The staff at the lobby snack bar is wonderful. Check-in was a breeze. My complaints...the walls are super thin. I could hear the guest in the next room coughing like he was in my room. Also, I wish there was body lotion in the room...they do supply shampoo and conditioner. All in all, I will stay here again, and hope the guests in the next room don't make too much noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your compliments! I will be sure to share them with the Bistro staff.  While we provide Paul Mitchel shampoo and conditioner in the guestrooms, we do have body lotion upon request. Please be sure to let us know when you are returning and we will be sure to place the body lotion in your room prior to your arrival.  We have also just upgraded our in room coffee to Seatlle's Best, which we hope you will enjoy. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Right in business district of Santa Ana
Summary: Staff is very friendly and helpful. They are making sure that your stay is comfortable. They even made me a sandwich after the cafe is closed. When I was there, the shuttle broke down but they paid for the taxi from and to the airport. There is a food mall just across the street. Quite nice.  Plenty of parking. Bed is comfortable. Room is clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Our number one priority is to provide our guests with a comfortable and enjoyable stay. We hope to you again really soon.

Summary Heading: This is what a courtyard should be
Summary: This property is what every courtyard should be like.  Is clean, comfortable, modern, friendly, and spacious.  There is a great pool and work out room and the Airport shuttle ran great.  It's extremely convenient to both 55 and the 405.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and review.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. The new Courtyard lobby is a great place to unwind, grab a drink or Starbucks or even catch up on emails.  We hope to see you again in the very near future

Summary: This hotel is a great location accessible to the 405 and john wayne airport, I love the lobby and the on screee that has news, the rooms are clean and spacious and great staff! absolutely a plus that starbucks is brewed. Very happy with my stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us.  We are very happy to hear how much you enjoyed the hotel. We are in a great location, just minutes away from Disneyland or the beach.  We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: This courtyard is brand new and has all of the bells and whistles business travelers come to expect - attentive staff, new style lobby with mixed seating areas, AM coffee, flat screen TV's, full bar, wi-fi everywhere (free), large fitness/pool, airport shuttle, and most importantly clean rooms. I was most impressed when the valet saw me about to run through the rain to my car (which I self parked vs $10 valet) and he gave me a huge umbrella to take. I'd choose to stay in one of these new courtyards over stuffy old so-called "5-star" - charge you $15 for wi-fi - hotels any day.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review.  We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay and were able to take advantage of some of the amenities that we offer. I will be sure to share with our valet team your kind words, as I know they strive to offer the best possible customer service.   We hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: My husband and I needed a getaway so we spent a night at the new Marriott  Courtyard in Santa Ana , and then went to see the Bowers Museum the next day.  Even though this Courtyard is pretty much for business related clientele, we loved the newness, stylish, large rooms and the friendly staff. We will surely return again to enjoy this restful hotel, near South Coast Plaza for  shopping, the wonderful Bowers Museum, the Performing Arts Center, and great restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Courtyard by Marriott Santa Ana/Orange County! I am pleased to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your stay with us.  You are correct, we are in a great location to visit the Bowers Museum, South Coast Plaza, Disneyland or the Beach Cities.  Thank you again and we will look forward to your return very soon,

Summary: First visit to this location very convenient to John Wayne airport. I was upgraded to a king suite which was wonderfully spacious and comfortable. Fast internet, very comfortable bed, clean - everything I need for a business trip. I am not a fan of the bistro experience, but there are great restaurant choices at a nearby mall. Definitely on my return list if ever back in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: You could tell it's still new; lacking customer service upon check in
Summary: I travel a lot for business and Courtyard (and other Marriot chains) are my hotel picks.  This hotel is still seemingly new. We reserved 2 rooms for my family for my high school reunion. The 2 rooms on same floor had exactly same layout - what I would expect. I can still smell the newness of the furniture, bedding, bathroom ,etc. YES, I travel to many a Courtyards and can tell the difference. Pool wasn't working while there - thus the knock down of 1 star. Typical new Courtyard cafe which is now what i expect of any Courtyard establishments (Cafe with booths and that serves Starbucks coffee). I knocked another star off because upon check-in at 1am, the agent did not even advise which direction were the elevators. Let me premise that I had called prior to 4pm to advise that 1
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to our area and our hotel.  We appreciate your choosing Marriott and in this instance, our hotel.  You are correct in that we still have that new feel and the lobby is in the same design concept with other new Courtyards, in that it has a very open feel, Starbucks and wireless internet throughout. In addition to your positive comments, I appreciate your feedback on the challenge that occurred upon check in.  It is sometimes a perception that the night shift person isn't expected to be friendly or helpful, and I appreciate your expectations and I agree with them.  Checking in late is when we most need that helpful smile, directions and a sincere offer to assist with anything else.  We will follow up with our late shift team members to stress the importance of this, as well as solicit their feedback on how they would feel receiving that same level of service.   Thank you again for your time and feedback and allowing our hotel to learn from this challenge and become a better place to stay.

Summary: The location was a bit odd. Not much in the neighborhood especially on a weekend. The hotel was new and nice enough. The pool is tiny. The room was quite nice with a lot of room. The shuttle was okay but the morning driver was a bit rude. He was late (a few minute, not much) but certainly not helpful. Overall a good stay waiting for the plane out the next day.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Currently staying at this property and this is a nice courtyard be. Close to airport it is vey modern with one of the largest lobby areas I have encountered anywhere. Lots of tables and chairs for dinning at the cafe that serves burgers, wings and other hot items for breakfast and dinner. Each  booth even have personal flat screen tv s . An extended sitting area has beautiful orange and tan seating with large flat screened tvs. The hotel has a beautiful decor and design. The contemporary room is large with a large bathroom. I was reluctant to book here and had originally stayed one night at a different hotel but I'm very glad we move here and will be returning for future OC travel. The staff is very friendly and the room feels and appears to be very clean.its very quiet and I
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for two nights over the weekend.  The hotel is located just five minutes drive from John Wayne Airport, a few minutes drive to South Coast Plaza Shopping Center, and about 20 minutes to Disneyland.  LIKES:  > Good location near airport with complimentary shuttle service to / from airport Monday to Friday > Well maintained property with a nice pool and well equipped gym > Clean, beautifully appointed room with contemporary design and very comfortable bed > Clean, bright, and spacious bathroom and shower > Reasonably priced, self service, bistro with individual TVs at some of the tables  DISLIKES:  > Paid parking, but as others have stated, this is typical for many properties in the area  I enjoyed my stay at this Courtyard and found this hotel to
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Love the valet option! The Valet attendant was as good as any concierge in town. My room was on the 3rd floor and right by the elevator- oh no! Not to worry, I never heard a thing. The desk is my only gripe. I really don' like the little slide in desk they put in the rooms. Just make the desk the right size and do away with that finger pincher. The bed was super soft and the bathroom was huge. Hot water was HOT. I did not eat or get any coffee since i was only there for about 8 hours to catch some sleep.  I'll book this hotel again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: First off I will start by saying the good things about this hotel. Since it is new there isn't much you can say about the cleanliness of the rooms ect because it is very well taken care of. Bathrooms are spacious and the beds are quite comfortable and the location of the hotel is not to bad either. Now here is where I just don't get it. Parking. You have to pay 15 dollars A DAY for parking. Seriously? The parking lot is literally right in front of the hotel hardly 20 steps from the front door, but yet im being charged to have my car there. Just ridiculous. Other complaints are they advertise free breakfast on some of the discounted hotel sites and I learned real quick that that wasn't the case. In fact they charge 8-12 dollars for a breakfast item. Way overpriced! Again just
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for taking time to provide feedback on your experience with us.  To begin, you have my apologies that you brought up questions to some of our team members and they were not able to answer these to your satisfaction.  With regards to the hold on your card, we typically try to have a standard amount that we would hold on a credit card and this is just to ensure that if purchases are made in the Bistro or our Market, then there aren't any challenges with a quick and efficient purchasing process.  And yes, we do have a charge for parking as this is something this particular area requires.  We have several factors that support this cost, however the most important being an additional employee to monitor and control the parking lot so that neighboring residents and businesses do not take our parking spots from our guests.   Again, thank you for your time in providing feedback and for your stay with us.  Please feel free to contact me with any questions or if I can be of assistance in any way.

Summary Heading: Three Visits Later, Still My First Choice Near SNA
Summary: I just completed my third stay at the Courtyard Santa Ana, and each visit has been delightful.  Perhaps it’s the new, brighter Courtyard interior.  Perhaps it’s the fact that this one-year old hotel is still sparkling.  Each of the three rooms has been impeccably clean.  Perhaps it’s the location – walking distance to Starbucks, five-minute drive to several fast food establishments, ten-minute drive to South Coast Plaza and John Wayne Airport.  Without a doubt, it’s the combination of all three which earns this property my first choice in Santa Ana.  If you’re a fan of the new Courtyard décor, then this is your place.  The rooms include everything you would expect from Courtyard – flat-screen television, comfortable bed, moveable desk, complimentary wireless internet – plus a
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Super duper clean hotel, minutes(less than 5) from John Wayne. Close to all major freeways, and in a safe area. Airport nearby but I didn't hear any planes overnight. Nice lobby area, nice Internet speed, and close to a ton of shopping, restaurants, etc  Stay here, safe bet!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: It was opened last year in 2011. This is my second stay. The hotel is only 2 minutes away (by car) from the freeway entrance. Book a room with 2 queen beds because it seems to be more spacious. Last year I stayed in a king bed room and the room was small. They have refrigerator in the room but no microwave. You can go down to the lobby (next to the entrance inside "Market" section) if you need to use a microwave. Their so called "Market" has lots of selection of potato chips but they don't sell some travel basic necessities like toothbrush, toothpaste, mouthwash, etc.There's a cafe by the lobby if you want breakfast, lunch, and dinner. It's open 24 hours.   Self park is $8 per day or valet for $11 per day. The parking lot is quite small so you might as well park your car
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Decent Hotel for Business near John Wayne Airport
Summary: I spent one night at this hotel for business.  From the outside, it didn't look like much but on the inside, the lobby looked newer and modern.  The front desk staff was very helpful.  They were polite and service oriented.  Check in was fast and efficient. Once I got to my room, the front desk called me to make sure everything was ok with my room.  I thought that was a nice added touch.  The lobby was newly updated with plenty of seating both at the Cafe and around the rest of the lobby.  I ate dinner at the restaurant there and it was pretty good.  The service at the restaurant was good.  It's not a full blown restaurant but it has a fair amount of options to choose from.  The only downside was that the hotel didn't offer room service so if you wanted to eat, you had to go
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary Heading: Great new place bur need work on service
Summary: This is really new hotel just little over year old - was clean and can tell it is new  Modern lobby was nice room was comfy but I don't know about service  The valet guy was super friendly (it runs by other company) when we check in front staff was just not friendly -no smile, don't ask question kind - nice to see welcome face after long drive, she was just play mean, shouldn't get Jop in service or Marriott should training employee better Other than that no complain  Would probably stay here again if rate is good
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and we are happy that you enjoyed the location and the design and amenities of the hotel.  I agree with you though, that if the service is not there, then it can really put a damper on having a truly great experience.  We are in the process of following up with our team members on additional training.  Our first step in this training is being able to take care of challenges, however the second part, which we're getting ready to begin, is how to properly welcome our guests.  Its our feeling that our team members have a strong desire to deliver great service, however need the tools that will allow them to properly communicate this perception to our guests.  In the instance of your check in, it sounds like our associate's intentions were not the best and we will definitely follow up on this.  Thank you for providing your feedback and allowing us the opportunity to follow up, work with our team and provide a better experience moving forward.  If I can be of additional assistance in any way, please do not hesitate to call or email.  Thank you and we hope to see you again.

Summary: this is the second time we stayed at this hotel this summer. room was clean and staff was nice. the parking fee really isn't fair but the valet were super, super nice and friendly. I would definatley stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: The hotel is new, clean and very comfortable. The staff very friendly, especially the valet. parking is tight so expect to valet and not self park. pool small but outside and the fitness center is clean, large and has great AC.  Food options right across the street include Starbucks and Rubio's. I'd stay here again if the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel and very friendly service
Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel (July 2012) for 2 nights arriving late and exhausted after a long day of travel.  My check-in experience was very pleasant and the lady manning the front desk was extremely friendly.  In fact, throughout my stay I couldn't help but take notice that EVERY employee that I encountered smiled and greeted me throughout my stay.  This included the valet (even though I chose to self-park), front desk staff, housekeeping staff, and even a maintenance worker who I ran into.    Room was clean and linens were comfortable and fresh.   Entire hotel has a nice "chic" vibe to it and the room was airy, decorated nicely, and had great black-out curtains to aid in some much needed rest for me!  Parking lot was ample and very well-lit.  I felt safe at this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: room was very clean. valet was exceptional but the front desk girls were not so great. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for your feedback on your experience.  We are happy that the guest room met your needs and that our valet person did a good job when you encountered them.  However, from your comment, it appears that our Front Desk Associates may have created a challenge or perhaps not provided the right type of service.  Please feel free to reach out to us at the property for more details.  We are confident that our team members strive to do a good job, however as challenges can occur, we are very open to this type of feedback as it helps us see what kind of job we did and how to improve moving forward.  We hope to hear from you soon. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Very pleased visitor - want to return
Summary: This is one of my favorite Marriott's!!!  Immaculate, professional and even better than the pictures.  5 mins to South Coast Plaza and 15 to Newport.  Worth every penny.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and we are very glad the location worked out well for you.  The Orange County area is great for getting around to see a lot in a very short distance.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The location and the hotel overalll was excellent.  Did not mind paying the $8 to park since there was easy access in and out.  The hotel was close to various restaurants and shopping centers which was nice.  Entire staff was very helpful and friendly-would definitely stay at this hotel again without a second thought.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel when in the area recently.  We're glad that the location worked out well and that you enjoyed your stay.  Our team works hard to do the right things and deliver good service and we appreciate you recognizing this.  We're certainly not perfect and in future stays, if you encounter any challenges, please let us know as your feedback is valuable, and is the best vehicle to make sure we stop short any challenges and get back on the right path.  Thank you again for staying and we hope you'll see us again soon.

Summary Heading: Super hotel!  Very new, near airport but very quiet, great staff.
Summary: I love Marriott in general.  This is a very nice one.  New and convenient to John Wayne airport. Very good rate.  I've stayed here twice now.  The last time I stayed, I had a personal problem come up and the manager went beyond the call of duty to help me out.  I appreciate the help and would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and posting your feedback here, on TripAdvisor.  Although we like good comments, the best compliment is to come and see us again when in the area and we appreciate your doing this.  Also, a special thanks for letting management know that there was a challenge and giving us the opportunity to find a solution.  This is very valuable to us and we appreciate it.  We wish you safe travels and hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel near airport and South Coast Plaza
Summary: Spent one night here on way down to San Diego.  Found a great rate on Marriott.com.  Hotel is new and staff very pleasant.  New bathroom design with glassed-in shower works well!  Had a quiet night's sleep on the conventional mattress (foam just too warm for me).  Excellent free coffee and wifi!  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel on your way down to San Diego.  We hope you had a pleasant trip all around and appreciate your feedback on our hotel.  We're glad you enjoyed the bathroom design and the wifi.  Both of these have been very popular with guests and we're happy they worked well for you during your trip.  Please come and see us again when you're in the area.

Summary: This Courtyard is in a great location near Orange County Airport and downtown.  It is very new, the staff is friendly and helpful.  Rooms are large and in very good shape as the hotel is almost new.  Thsi is an excellent choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with our hotel and for your feedback and comments.  We appreciate it and are glad that the hotel worked out well for you.  We are one of the closest Marriott properties to the John Wayne airport and have a shuttle during the week to get to and from the terminals and on weekends, we will cover the taxi fare if our shuttle is not running.  Please come back and see us soon.

Summary: I wanted a hotel close to the airport and to several higher ed institutions in the area. The lobby was modern and the rooms were very nice. I'll definitely choose this hotel when I'm in the area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and we are happy that the hotel was able to meet your needs.  Courtyard has a very standard room package, however its become standard through the ability to customize to what our travelers need.  It sounds like everything was in good working order, however if that may ever not be the case, please let us know.  Although we attempt to get things right the first time, challenges can occur, and we're here to fix those things.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Really Hits the Mark For Business Travelers
Summary: New property - great design, room layout was excellent, love the new Courtyard public areas with the personal TV's and booths were you can sit and work without being isolated in your room. This was also a perfect location to access all of the Newport Beach area. There are a couple of casual dining restaurants across the street too. Staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and feedback on your recent stay.  Also, thank you for choosing our hotel while in the area.  We're very glad that everything worked well during your stay and we hope to see you again.  We did want to point out your interesting observation of how close this part of Santa Ana is to the Newport area, beach, etc.  We've started to see many guests who want to stay in a different area than Newport and then simply make the quick trip over.   We're happy it worked well for you and hopefully you'll come back to see us again.

Summary: Planned a last minute trip to Newport Beach, since we didn't want to drive back to LA, we decided to get a room nearby.  After looking and looking at all the different travel websites and seeing that the nice hotels were at least $150+, I found this gem on Kayak for $80 bucks!  I couldn't believe it.  As soon as we arrived, we knew we made the right choice.  The hotel is about a 10 minute ride to the Newport Pier, but so worth it.  Take a cab, much easier.   The room we had was modern, clean, and the bed was oh so comfy!  So hard to get out of bed and leave.  The shower was amazing, and the bathroom really nice.  There is a little store downstairs, alcohol can be purchased until 2am and there is also a Bistro.      After staying here, I know we will definitely make the drive out
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and for coming out to visit Orange County.  I wasn't sure if you may be an LA native or visiting Southern California, however either way, its so great that you were able to get a good experience and have it be convenient at the same time.  This part of Santa Ana is very centrally located and can have you in Irvine, Costa Mesa or Newport within a few short minutes.  We're happy it worked well and that you enjoyed your stay.  And we definitely look forward to having you come back to visit us again.

Summary: Spent an inexpensive weekend at this new Courtyard in Santa Ana, California, while attending the Newport Film Festival ($71.00 a night).  Two adjoining rooms, each with two beds, were comfortable and quiet.  Nice touches including large vanity area in bathroom, modern shower (no tub), and full length mirror in room.  Good WiFi.  Elevator is slow.  Nice bar/bistro in lobby serving breakfast and dinner plus Starbuck's specialty drinks and a small bar open in evening.  Comfortable side lobby seating plus workstations in separate area.  Quick walk across the street to a Starbucks and several other small fast-food possibilities plus an Italian and Japanese restaurant (grabbed a quick sandwich at Togo's one day). Easy freeway access via 55, close to South Coast Plaza, Newport Beach,
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and we hope the film festival was enjoyable.  Getting to Newport from the hotel is normally a pretty quick and easy trip, so we hope you found it to be this way as well.  And hopefully the movies were good, too. We appreciate your feedback and are happy that it was a positive experience for you.  Please come and stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Was able to check-in early at noon. Nice room, sucks that you have to pay for parking. I got my room cheap, last minute for $71 on a Saturday night. I could have gotten a much nicer room in the same area for the same price without parking if I would have booked my room a few day prior to booking this room. I was late and it was my fault. The halls did smell kinda funky, the parking guy was rude, but it didn't bother me. I just needed a place to send the night. There were tons of people at the pool when I checked in. Not sure if it was heated but they were having fun. I would mos def stay here again.  The rooms weren't fancy but also looked renovated and nicer than I expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us recently and for your feedback on your time with us.  We are glad that the pricing that you found worked well and hope to see you again soon.  My apologies that our parking attendant was less than cordial.   We will follow up with our supervisor over this department to ensure they are aware that we received a review that was less than our expectation for any employee of the hotel.  Our valet attendants normally do a very good job, however we as a hotel need to always remember that if we fail to offer the proper service to even one, single guest, then for that guest, we failed one hundred percent.   Thank you for sharing this with us.  Although, we strive to ensure that this type of service isn't representative of our staff as a whole, without valuable feedback like this, we cannot make the changes and follow up properly to ensure we stay on the right path.  Thank you again and we hope to see you again.

Summary: I spent a night here while on business in Santa Ana, CA.  Parking was $8, which was about the only thing that was unfortunate about the hotel. The staff were friendly, and the lobby is very nice and modern. They have a cafe/bistro which was quite modern and attractive, although I didn't eat anything it looked like a great convenience and a somewhat more reasonable choice than the typical overpriced hotel restaurant.  The elevator did creak and vibrate which was unusual, given how new and modern all the rest of the facility appeared.  The room was very attractive, very modern in style, and was furnished with some artwork and knicknacks that were a step above most hotels in this class. The bathroom was attractive and modern. The bed and pillows had crisp white sheets and were
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for your feedback regarding your stay.   We appreciate your kind words and that most of the experience was a positive one.   You'd mentioned the elevator had some creaking to it and I wanted to reassure you that we have our elevators inspected each month, however from what I've been able to research, this is due to the elevator being a hydraulic type, which also can be a little slower than the pulley type.   I will bring it up to our technician though, to see if we are able to make some changes that will reduce any noise.   Also, I wanted to make mention that our Bistro cafe also has a full Starbucks in it.  So the next time that you're with us and you have a taste for a latte, cappucino, etc, give us a try as we do a great job with these.  Thanks again for staying with us and writing in.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Courtyard Santa Ana John Wayne Airport at the end of April.  I was attending a 2 day seminar at this hotel.  From the moment we walked in, we were greeted warmly by the Front Desk people.  We were given a room when we arrived which was around 1:00pm on Sunday which was really nice considering check in is usually 3:00pm.  The room was comfortable and had a seating area, desk, flat screen tv, mini fridge and single serving coffee maker.  The bathroom was a good size, but for those who like a bathtub, the standard rooms only have a shower (no bathtub).  They offer very nice bath soaps and hair product.  The one thing that my husband and I really appreciated was there were alot of accessible electrical outlets.  We came with laptop, 2 cell phones, and
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to our hotel and for your kind words and detailed summary.   We strive to satisfy guests on the first try and it sounds like our team and product was able to do this.  But even in putting forth the effort to get things right the first time, challenges may occur and our team has also been trained on proper follow up.  We hope to see you again in the future and hope we do just as good of a job, if not better. However, if any challenges should ever occur, please let us know about this as well and if our team did a good job and what we can improve on.  But please come back and see us soon.

Summary: There are dozens of hotels/motels in Orange county.  I will come back because of the Staff.  From the front desk, to bellman and security, and the Bistro employees, everyone made us feel welcome and went the extra step for customer service. The room was clean and in excellent condition.  We did use the outdoor smoking area, which was clean every time we went out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for the positive feedback.  We appreciate your kind words, especially with regards to the customer service you experienced.  Although everything went well with your stay, there are times where challenges will occur and its our intention that you'll receive that same level of customer service when our team offers a solution.  We look forward to seeing you again and please continue to share feedback.  We love to hear the good things, however if there is ever a challenge, please let us know about that as well so that we can make sure its a one time occurrence and not an ongoing issue.  Safe travels.

Summary: Very nice new Courtyard. Rooms are great. Internet worked well. Great lobby area. Front desk help not very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for your feedback on the product and the service.  We will follow up with our team members to ensure we all understand that we need to put forth the extra effort to ensure we are providing the right service to all of our guests.  Please know that we will place an emphasis on this and please know that I'm available if you'd like to share any further information or if I can be of assistance in any way. Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel so I could use the shuttle to the airport and upon checking in was told that starting Friday at 2:00 PM they stop running the shuttle for the weekend,  They made it sound like a regualr weekend procedure.   PLUS, they charge $8.00 a day for self-parking and convenient parking is very limited.  I was able to get a very good rate, which made the parking charge tolerable, just be aware.  If not for these 2 negatives, I'd give this hotel 4 stars at least,
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for your kind words of providing 4 stars if not for the challenge of our airport shuttle and parking charge.  I completely understand that the extra cost of parking is something that isn't always budgeted for, however thank you for seeing that  we attempt to offer some really great rates to help make up for this.   In order to get our hotel as close to the airport as possible, our lot size had to become creative with having as much parking as possible and to do this, we had to place a good bit of it as tandem parking.  And this meant bringing in a separate company to handle the parking in the best way possible, however we are still always looking for new and inventive ways to be efficient and cost effective to our guests.  With regards to our airport shuttle on weekends, you are correct in that we do not have this running on weekends on a consistent basis.  However our staff should have offered to take care of cab fare as we still offer complimentary service to and from the airport.  It sounds like we may not have done this, so please give me a call or email so that we can ensure we take care of you on the cost of taxi fare.  Thank you again for your stay with us and for sharing your comments.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My family needed an inexpensive hotel to stay in the night before our Disneyland package kicked in. My husband had stayed here at the Courtyard for business, so we gave it a try.  I wish we could have stayed here for our whole visit instead of moving up near Disneyland! The rooms are clean and quiet, with that look that only a newly built property can have. We all found the beds to be quite comfortable, and the price for the room was awesome. There is a snack shop on site, but we enjoyed the Starbucks, Rubio's Grill and sandwich shop you can walk to across the street. You are also quite close to the Newport mall, beaches, etc. Since it is only about a 15 minute drive from Disneyland, I think we will seriously consider staying here next time instead of being closer to the theme
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with our hotel and we are very happy that the location worked so well for you.  Many times on a weekend where there isn't a special event in Santa Ana, we hear the comments asking why potential guests would choose to stay.  The reason that you gave of being very close to Disneyland, but close to the beach as well, is one that we have begun to hear more and more and we are very happy that it worked out well for you.  You truly are getting some of the best parts of Orange County.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location.
Summary: Very close to the airport. the rooms are very nice and the exercise room is well stocked. good treadmills and free weights
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for your kind words.  One of the nice benefits to having a developer build a hotel for the first time is that there's a good chance to end up with a few perks.  A normal fitness center for a hotel our size is about 500sq ft, however we were able to have ours created at 1300sq ft.  Lots of free weights and machines and a great view of the pool.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is surrounded by office complexes, major freeways and very near to John Wayne Airport, Irvine - which makes it very convenient for all of the businesses in the area. In fact, I was there for two nights on a business trip and will definitely stay here again. You can self-park for $8 per night or the very nice valet will drive your car 50 feet to the parking lot for more. Check-in is fast and easy; the staff are young, smart, diverse and professional. The rooms are clean and nicely appointed with larger-than-expected bathrooms. The lobby is exceptionally user-friendly with tables, semi-enclosed booths with individual TV's (for alone dining or small informal chats) and a breakfast/dinner bar which serves hot food and cafe style coffees. Service was a little slow, but
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I thought this was a fine hotel in every respect and it met my fussy expectations.  1.  They actually had a valet out front.  Unfortunately I didn't need one that night but I despise getting to a hotel late with bags and a need to park my car only to find no one.  2.  Despite being 100% sold out and despite my late arrival, they accommodated my request for a non-connecting room.  3.  I liked the new lobby and the room decor.  4. I thought the rooms were well appointed. I often try to avoid CY's because of the noisy through-the-wall heating/cooling units but fortunately this was CA so the weather was mild and no heating or cooling was necessary.    I didn't like - as is always the case at CY's - the meager blankets.  And the place is not well built from a sound attenuation
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with our hotel and for sharing your experience.  Although we are very happy that you were pleased with the accommodations, thank you as well for pointing out some of the interactions with team members.  We have trained our Front Desk team members on Starbucks so that this is available throughout the day, and I am in hopes that if we provided this for you, that it was enjoyable.  Courtyard is still in the process of attempting to become a more modern brand that not only focuses on great guest service, but also a product that is up to date, functional and enjoyable.  I am in hopes that you will find this experience true at many other Courtyards around the country.

Summary Heading: Bad Service.  New hotel needs to get kinks out.
Summary: Courtyard Santa Ana John Wayne Airport/Orange County  My co-worker and I stayed at the Courtyard Marriott in Santa Ana on a Thursday and Friday night, in February 2012.  We travel a lot and enjoy booking Marriott's based on their quality of service.  This hotel did not meet our expectations.   Here is a list of some things we experienced...  1.) The GPS will not take you to the hotel.  We tried with the GPS in the car, Google Maps on a phone and Navigation on an IPad).  When we talked to a Marriott associate on the second day about this he said they were very aware of the problem and heard it often.  2.) When we called to ask directions, letting them know that we were guests on the way and were lost, we were placed on hold for five minutes.  No one ever came back to help us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for letting us know the experience that you received.  Although we as a hotel experience challenges from time to time as any other business, as a Marriott property, we pride ourselves on our ability to recover, but put every effort into getting it right the first time.  We did a very poor job on all fronts during your stay and we apologize for this.  The most disappointing part of your review and experience is that our employees' ability and desire to offer great guest service did not shine through; this is unacceptable.  Please know that we have followed up with our team members to ensure there is an understanding that we cannot be focused only 99% of the time, because if one guest comes to the hotel and isn't given the proper service, then we failed as a hotel 100% with that guest.  We do not accept substandard guest service performances from our team and this is why we appreciate your comments and letting us know your experience.  With regards to the GPS challenge, our staff is aware of this, however what failed to happen was our team member asking the right questions.  Our hotel is brand new and our address is brand new and although we continue to follow up with all GPS providers, we are not done yet and the effort continues.  We have come across some GPS devices that require updates and if the updates have not been secured, then the address does not come up properly.  Also, being a new property, there have been a few kinks to work out as all of our moving parts are working together, and the evening that you were here, we had a water repair that was required.  We attempted to perform this in the late evening hours during a time when the hotel was not as busy, however the proper procedure was to let you, as a guest, know at check in and then with a flier under your door, so that you would be aware.  Please accept our apologies for this.  Again, thank you for your comments and sharing your experience.  This is not the type of performance that we like to hear about in relation to our hotel and team, however to not know about it would never give us the opportunity to learn and put the proper actions in place to correct challenges and move forward.  Thank you and please come and give us a try again to see our improvements at work.

Summary Heading: New Hotel with Very low level of service
Summary: I have been in many Marriott Courtyard in the last 3 years and this Hotel does not comply with the standards we are used to. We asked for a junior suite because we had our daughter for a night. The sofa bed was not ready and when we asked for someone to make it up, the answer was ... I send the Bed sheets and you do the bed!!!. Then next morning when we arrive for breakfast (1/2 hour before closing time) they were just closed. After talking to them for more that 5 minutes they agree to reopen breakfast. This is a new hotel, nice rooms, good price, but the staff that is running the Hotel does not have a clue on how to achieve the service level we as customers are expecting from the Courtyard brand.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel and for letting us know about your experience.  Please know that your comments have been heard loud and clear and the message that we as a hotel have received is that our service level not only did not shine through, but made it a challenge to you during your stay.  This is not the way a hotel should be operated.  We have followed up with our team members that you encountered during your stay, but also at our monthly all employee gathering with our entire team.  We have shared the message that good service starts with good communication and understanding what is needed and then our job as a hotel team is to follow up with the options that we are able to carry out.   Please accept our apologies as this is not the level that our team should be or will be performing at.

Summary: Well, what a pleasant surprise.  Some Courtyards have had their lobby re-jazzed and are now rather fancy.  This is one of those.  The room, too, was a pleasant surprise with the usual matronly Marriott chintz cast aside for clean lines and functional built-ins.  The bed was only OK - the mattress was just not firm enough for me, but perhaps it suits others.  And charging for parking at a Courtyard? We are not talking about a Courtyard in Manhattan NY, or downtown Boston, so what's up with that?   And a pool right at the front entrance, next to the parking lot?  Not sure if I'm up to run out there in my skivvies.  Overall recommended when needing an inexpensive room for the night in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Excellent experience at this brand new hotel. Great location (close to freeway and South Coast Plaza) and all you need for a great stay - all new amenities. The pool and jacuzzi were very enjoyable. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: A pleasant hotel with some quirks
Summary: The fairly new hotel provided me a comfortable room on the fourth (top) floor with a king bed, a nice flat screen TV and a basic, but reasonably powerful walk in shower. Though sometimes planes flying overhead could be heard, it was rare, indeed housekeeping walking by outside with their walkie talkies were noisier than the planes. The principal oddities were the elevators and the parking. I brought along a newspaper because on average it took five minutes for an elevator to get to the fourth floor and the slowness was likely not helped by staff using the same elevators as guests to move their crates and carts. I got barged by one racing staffer with a large cart who ran in when the elevator door opened not realizing a guest was inside. The other oddity had to do with parking. I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary: Nicely maintained hotel.  If you have stayed in a Courtyard, you will know layout.  Nice beds and linen, although maybe a bit heavy on the bleach, as I smelt bleach on the sheets (better than dirty sheets by a long shot)  Toiletries  at Courtyard are utilitarian.  The doors in our room were very heavy and closed loudly.  Free wifi, but parking cost 8 or 10 dollars. Staff was friendly. Oatmeal at breakfast was very good and nicely presented.  Great access to freeways of Orange county made this place  so easy to get from here to there .
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: A new property, this Courtyard is very clean and everything was in working order during my stay.  The hardwire worked well; I did not use the wifi.  It was easy to get on the 55 and the 405 from this hotel's location at MacArthur Place and MacArthur Blvd.  Lower than average shower pressure.  You can't walk to much from this Courtyard -- a Starbucks and some fast casual restaurants across MacArthur Place, and a few office buildings in the MacArthur Place complex.  I was on the second of four floors, and I could hear some street noise in the room, though it was generally inobstrusive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary Heading: A Marriott built for the 21st Century
Summary: From the key cards that you wave in front of a key pad to unlock the hotel room - great when you're carrying luggage - to the airline ticket printer in the lobby, this hotel has all the modern conveniences. The TV in the lobby has a touch screen that supplies directions to points of interest in Orange County. The bistro near the lobby has private cubbies for eating (complete with your own TV). All of these conveniences mean nothing without great service and the staff at this Marriott was extremely helpful and friendly. The only drawback to this hotel is the charge for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: It's a brand new hotel and definitely feels like it. Entire hotel is really clean with nice amenities.  Only complaint I had is that there's no bathtub, but only showers. Shower door had a really poor seal, so the floor got wet every time we used it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel Reasonably Priced in Airport/OC Amenities
Summary: Agree with room being very clean and nice, except for the gorilla that pounded on our ceiling early Sunday morning.  Every step was a sonic boom in our room and they would not stop walking around!  Room smaller than traditional Courtyard, but nicer bed and AC.  Elevators slow, but with only 4 floors, not the worst in the world.  Staff was very friendly, but surprised that food (breakfast) was not included.  Parking ok, paid the $11 for valet for 1 night.  Free coffee by the computers was very watery, but they only gave one regular coffee for the coffee pot in the room, so had to go down.  Would stay again, but price with AAA and parking came to $115 with no breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and recent stay with us.  Our apologies for sounded like a bit of noise coming from above.  In the future, please let us know about this during your stay and we can at least double check and make sure there are not kids horse playing or something of that nature.  And please let us know if extra coffee is needed in the guest rooms.  We're more than happy to provide this. Thank you again and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Not your old style Courtyard/Parking fee
Summary: New style Courtyard. We like the older style pool area in the older Courtyards. This pool area is cold/non green right at the front entrance. Service, rooms were very good. Bathroom door comment on other review is true, won t stay open. Biggest pet peeve: PARKING fee of $8.00 per night. Top it off they share the parking lot with overflow parking fwith the Doubletree on the same complex, I have stayed at that Doubletree and parked in this lot for free!! wierd. I asked about it and they said it was an aggreement they had to make to build the hotel. Next time I would stay at the Doubletree Club or a older Courtyard on Main and Jamboree a couple of miles away where there is no parking fee.We stayed at this one because the price was right , however missed the parking fee on the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary Heading: New Marriott Courtyard and its good
Summary: This a new hotel and looks great in the standard Courtyard presentation, good sized cafe and lounge area, great gym, good pool and whirlpool, ok guest laundry.  Strange to pay for parking around here $8 per day.  The staff were very good and paid attention to any requests.  The room is ok, a bit small but still ok.  The fitout is great and it feels really nice. The elevators were the slowest ever and I found the stair configuration and location did not make it easier to use them instead.  The hotel has four floors. Overall a good hotel at a reasonable price.

The hotel is fantastic in all aspects from the check in staff to the pool cleaner, everyone was pleasant and friendly.The on site bistro has excellent food and the oatmeal and breakfast sandwich are better than most I have had. Beds were comfortable and the bathroom was a bit larger than the standard -size hotel bathroom.  Gym was very good for a hotel in this class.  Food & Starbucks across the street. The bad: frustratingly slow elevators, paying for parking.

Summary: The room is quite small even though it says for a king size bed and a sofa bed. It must be a very tiny sofa bed. It's new so it's still very clean. The bathroom door is a bit weird because you cannot let it open. No bath tub but it's okay. It's designed more for a business hotel. Parking is $8 per day for self park and $11 per day for valet park which is weird for Irvine area where it's normally free. There's a small fridge and a coffee maker in the room, as well as hair dryer. It's not for a long stay. There's a pool outside right by the parking lot, to the side of the main entrance which is a bit odd. Normally they have a pool in the back, not in the front/side of the hotel main entrance.
